['', 'This is a full-time salaried position. Salary is commensurate with experience, with a starting range of $50k to $59k per year.\xa0', 'Demonstrated experience and skill in managing and analyzing data is a must. This is an ideal position for someone with education or experience in one of the following: advertising and marketing data such as direct marketing; financial data such as analysis and research; or academic equivalents such as survey data, compiling study results, or similar.\xa0', 'Working directly with the company’s CEO, you will use tools such as Excel, Salesforce, Hubspot, and in-house databases, to continue to build out and maintain a secure, robust, and comprehensive collection of data and information on our membership, contacts, and clients.\xa0', 'Job Details:', 'Please note that though this will begin as a mostly remote position for obvious reasons, all applicants must be currently based in the New York City area in order to be considered.', 'About From Day One:', 'The Junior Data Analyst will play an essential role in managing the core community of From Day One, working extensively with our software tools and multiple members of our team to make sure our mailing lists and databases are well maintained.\xa0', 'Our business model includes both online and real-world content. We have hosted an extensive series of one-day conferences in a dozen cities around the country, and we will announce our next set of events when it’s possible to do so safely. In addition, we host a regular series of online gatherings, ranging from topic-focused webinars several times a week, to monthly virtual conferences, as well as regular roundtables and small-group sessions.\xa0', 'Diversity and inclusion are absolutely core to our mission, and we are committed to those values in our hiring process.\xa0\xa0', 'NYC Applicants Only:', 'Experience:', 'must be currently based in the New York City area', 'This position requires a 4-year college/university degree at minimum, with a strong academic background.', 'The ideal candidate will have 1-3 years of professional experience and will be able to demonstrate aptitude and success in compiling, understanding, managing, manipulating, and reporting on data.\xa0', 'At a time when society holds businesses to a rising level of accountability, From Day One explores how companies can build well-grounded values into their business—diversity, responsibility, transparency—and stick with them in an economy driven by disruption.', 'What’s unique about From Day One is our cross-disciplinary approach, bringing together executives from the fields of corporate social responsibility, human resources, marketing, and communications. Our events facilitate people-focused conversations that promote real, actionable ideas for and from executives, civic leaders, authors, and journalists across the country. Businesses have increasingly seen the wisdom of putting people first. Our mission is to help companies find the best ways to deliver on that promise, from day one.\xa0', 'In addition, we regularly publish articles including reporting and opinion pieces by our team and a network of notable journalists, led by the company’s chief content officer, veteran journalist Stephen Koepp.', 'From Day One offers a comprehensive benefits package including health insurance (including medical, dental, and vision coverage), competitive vacation policies including summer and winter breaks, and an employee stock plan.\xa0\xa0', 'The Role:', 'From Day One is a media outlet and conference series focused on innovative ways for companies to foster stronger relationships with their employees, customers, and communities.\xa0', 'For now this position will be remote, for obvious reasons, but you must be currently based in the New York City area and available to work at our office in the DUMBO neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York, when that becomes possible. In addition, this job is likely to eventually require travel to our conferences, which take place around the country.']

['', 'This person will be responsible for:', 'GAINSIGHT KNOWLEDGE/EXPERIENCE', '- Troubleshooting data issues', 'Tableau development - understanding of relational databases, joining multiple datasets, level of detail equations, dashboard designGoogle Sheets - vlookups, conditional formatting, data validationNice to have (not required): Salesforce reporting, SQL, PythonGAINSIGHT KNOWLEDGE/EXPERIENCE', 'Day-to-Day', 'Nice to have (not required): Salesforce reporting, SQL, Python', 'Job Description:', '-Updating data', 'Title: Data Analyst (Customer Success)', 'Openings: 1', 'Tableau development - understanding of relational databases, joining multiple datasets, level of detail equations, dashboard design', 'Google Sheets - vlookups, conditional formatting, data validation', 'We are seeking a Data Analyst to support the Prisma Cloud Customer Success team with reporting and automation needs.', '-Related documentation', 'Rate: $60 - $70/hr', '- Creating and updating Tableau dashboards', 'FULLY REMOTE - MUST BE ABLE TO WORK W2(CAN NOT SPONSOR VISA)', '- Pulling data from Salesforce, Gainsight, and BigQuery', '- Presenting data in Google Sheets', 'Start Date: ASAP', 'Location: REMOTE']

['', 'When you are handed a mess, you enjoy and take pride in creating organization', 'About DoorDash', 'We are doers - We believe the only way to predict the future is to build it. Creating solutions that will lead our company and our industry is what we do -- on every project, every day. ', ' Drive step change improvement in the quality and usefulness of DoorDash’s data Enable our sales team to efficiently sell complex businesses and merchants Ensure DoorDash maintains contract compliance while continuing fast growth Make tools like DoorDash’s Merchant Portal work for large franchised businesses Improve the quality of the lead lists driving our large sales organization Work closely with DoorDash’s product, sales operations, and sales teams Lead data projects and support systems projects creating transformational change through data migration, cleansing, and enrichment ', 'You have an ownership mentality, and will do what is necessary to drive results', 'We offer great compensation packages and comprehensive health benefits.', 'You have a bachelor’s degree and 3+ years of relevant experience ', 'Improve the quality of the lead lists driving our large sales organization', 'You’re Excited About This Opportunity Because You Will', 'We are leaders - Leadership is not limited to our management team. It’s something everyone at DoorDash embraces and embodies.', 'You are highly proficient in Excel, comfortable working with large data sets', 'You have the determination to initiate and complete projects in a scrappy environment', 'About The Role', 'You have an understanding of relational databases, ETL tools, data conversion and data cleansing methods', 'We are leaders', 'We are doers', 'You are highly proficient in Salesforce structure and reporting', 'You are highly analytical with strong attention to detail', 'We are customer obsessed - Our mission is to grow and empower local economies. We are committed to our customers, merchants, and dashers and believe in connecting people with possibility.', 'We’re Excited About You Because', ' You have a bachelor’s degree and 3+ years of relevant experience  You have an understanding of relational databases, ETL tools, data conversion and data cleansing methods You are highly proficient in Excel, comfortable working with large data sets You are highly proficient in Salesforce structure and reporting You have experience using SQL to aggregate, gather and cleanse data (Preferred) You have strong structured critical thinking and problem solving skills You are highly analytical with strong attention to detail When you are handed a mess, you enjoy and take pride in creating organization You have an ownership mentality, and will do what is necessary to drive results You have the determination to initiate and complete projects in a scrappy environment ', 'Why You’ll Love Working at DoorDash', 'Lead data projects and support systems projects creating transformational change through data migration, cleansing, and enrichment', 'Make tools like DoorDash’s Merchant Portal work for large franchised businesses', ' We are leaders - Leadership is not limited to our management team. It’s something everyone at DoorDash embraces and embodies. We are doers - We believe the only way to predict the future is to build it. Creating solutions that will lead our company and our industry is what we do -- on every project, every day.  We are learning - We’re not afraid to dig in and uncover the truth, even if it’s scary or inconvenient. ['Whatever your decision, it will not be considered in the hiring process or thereafter. Any information that you do provide will be recorded and maintained in a confidential file. Gender Please select Are you Hispanic/Latino? Please select Race & Ethnicity Definitions If you believe you belong to any of the categories of protected veterans listed below, please indicate by making the appropriate selection. As a government contractor subject to Vietnam Era Veterans Readjustment Assistance Act (VEVRAA), we request this information in order to measure the effectiveness of the outreach and positive recruitment efforts we undertake pursuant to VEVRAA. Classification of protected categories is as follows: A "disabled veteran" is one of the following: a veteran of the U.S. military, ground, naval or air service who is entitled to compensation (or who but for the receipt of military retired pay would be entitled to compensation) under laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs; or a person who was discharged or released from active duty because of a service-connected disability. A "recently separated veteran" means any veteran during the three-year period beginning on the date of such veteran\'s discharge or release from active duty in the U.S. military, ground, naval, or air service. An "active duty wartime or campaign badge veteran" means a veteran who served on active duty in the U.S. military, ground, naval or air service during a war, or in a campaign or expedition for which a campaign badge has been authorized under the laws administered by the Department of Defense. An "Armed forces service medal veteran" means a veteran who, while serving on active duty in the U.S. military, ground, naval or air service, participated in a United States military operation for which an Armed Forces service medal was awarded pursuant to Executive Order 12985. Veteran Status Please select Form CC-305 OMB Control Number 1250-0005 Expires 05/31/2023 Voluntary Self-Identification of Disability Why are you being asked to complete this form? We are a federal contractor or subcontractor required by law to provide equal employment opportunity to qualified people with disabilities. We are also required to measure our progress toward having at least 7% of our workforce be individuals with disabilities. To do this, we must ask applicants and employees if they have a disability or have ever had a disability. Because a person may become disabled at any time, we ask all of our employees to update their information at least every five years. Identifying yourself as an individual with a disability is voluntary, and we hope that you will choose to do so. Your answer will be maintained confidentially and not be seen by selecting officials or anyone else involved in making personnel decisions. Completing the form will not negatively impact you in any way, regardless of whether you have self-identified in the past. For more information about this form or the equal employment obligations of federal contractors under Section 503 of the Rehabilitation Act, visit the U.S. Department of Labor’s Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs (OFCCP) website at ', 'PUBLIC BURDEN STATEMENT: According to the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995 no persons are required to respond to a collection of information unless such collection displays a valid OMB control number. This survey should take about 5 minutes to complete.', "How do you know if you have a disability? You are considered to have a disability if you have a physical or mental impairment or medical condition that substantially limits a major life activity, or if you have a history or record of such an impairment or medical condition. Disabilities include, but are not limited to: Autism Autoimmune disorder, for example, lupus, fibromyalgia, rheumatoid arthritis, or HIV/AIDS Blind or low vision Cancer Cardiovascular or heart disease Celiac disease Cerebral palsy Deaf or hard of hearing Depression or anxiety Diabetes Epilepsy Gastrointestinal disorders, for example, Crohn's Disease, or irritable bowel syndrome Intellectual disability Missing limbs or partially missing limbs Nervous system condition for example, migraine headaches, Parkinson’s disease, or Multiple sclerosis (MS) Psychiatric condition, for example, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, PTSD, or major depression Disability Status Please select 1 Section 503 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended. Experience with cooperative databases, circulation planning, advertising agencies, or brokers is a plus.', 'Assist in leveraging existing data sources to their fullest potential for use in Wiland models and/or products.', 'Location: Niwot, CO', 'Education, Experience & Qualifications:', 'Review and perform quality checks of data performance in modeling and scoring.', 'Experience with predictive modeling methods is a plus.', '1+ years’ experience with databases, data access tools, and SQL.', 'We are seeking dedicated, high caliber professionals who are smart and energetic, have a positive attitude and take pride in their work. Currently, we have an opening for a Data Quality Analyst. The Data Quality Analyst is responsible for evaluating and ensuring data quality across Wiland’s various data sources. In addition, the Data Quality Analyst is responsible for planning and executing data tests, evaluation of change over time, and evaluation of new data. This includes studying and evaluating current reporting, utilizing and improving current data evaluation methods, writing test plans/cases, planning the test schedules, coordinating test resources, executing test cases, verifying test results, and maintaining a reusable library of test cases to support future testing.\xa0Tasks\xa0and responsibilities of the Data Quality Analyst position include:', 'Bachelor’s Degree or higher in business or a quantitative discipline (Business Data Analytics, Data Analysis, Statistics, Economics, Mathematics, etc.) or equivalent work experience.\xa0Must be able to produce college transcripts showing minimum 3.0 GPA.2+ years of professional experience in applying data analysis in a business setting, with strong preference given to experience in direct and/or digital marketing. Experience with cooperative databases, circulation planning, advertising agencies, or brokers is a plus.Experience with predictive modeling methods is a plus.Solid quantitative and analytical aptitude and the ability to apply those concepts in a business setting, identifying relevant business questions and conceptualizing quantitative solutions (key measures, reporting, analysis, etc.).2+ years’ experience with R, Python, or related statistical software package including extensive programming skills.1+ years’ experience with databases, data access tools, and SQL.', 'Compensation Range: $56,000 - $70,000. Total compensation for this role also includes a variable component.', 'Regular review of all standardized reporting about contact data and attribute data. Work with other analysts/teams as needed to accomplish the goal of assessing data quality. Analysis methodology should include standard analysis as well as use of Wiland proprietary methods of analysis.', 'Our benefits include: Medical, Dental and Vision, Flexible Spending Account, Basic and Voluntary Life/ADD&D Insurance, Short & Long-Term Disability, 401(k) Retirements Savings Plan, Generous PTO Accruals and Designated Company Holidays.']

Some of these include:', 'Review/analyze data and report showing statistics/ information about specific topics', 'Perform data analysis as needed on production data', ': ', ' *know* ', 'As of March 2021, simultaneous developments in the global\xa0Drug Safety and Pharmacovigilance Software Market\xa0are showing unfaltering growth projections through 2027, effectively harnessed by prominent market drivers, naming ArisGlobal as a “Key Player.” Come see why ArisGlobal is not just sustainable but is also considered to be one of the greatest places to work in Miami, Hungary, Germany, Rome, Spain, Japan, Bangalore, and Mysore (to start).', "FSA + HSA's, Non-med insurances + Teladoc + pet insurance + theft protection + more…", 'Run SQL queries as needed', '401(k) ADP: 3% match, first pay period', 'Excel Blackbelt/expert ability to run SQL queries', 'faster', 'High mathematical ability and above average analytical skillsExcel Blackbelt/expert ability to run SQL queriesOrganized, always planning ahead, even meeting deadlines earlyEffective communication and relationship building skillsSelf-motivated, team player who can also work autonomouslyProblem solving + highly analytical, using a methodical and logical approachAccuracy and attention to detail', '\xa0Drug Safety and Pharmacovigilance Software Market', 'The main responsibilities of the Data Analyst - SQL include: to honor the needs of the business by leveraging expert skills in SQL and above average analytical skills, blackbelt knowledge/utilization of Excel and other relational databases, and ensuring custom coordination of reporting, managing and maintaining the data integrity for the organization and CSM team. The individual in this role will also focus on developing the attributes necessary for client relationship management. Additional responsibilities may include: developing custom test plans and executing them using SQL, analyzing production data, and writing custom reports as needed.', 'Support inquiries from client, operations, and customer support on content related questions and monitor areas for improvement', "401(k) ADP: 3% match, first pay periodCigna health, dental, vision: day onePaid maternity + paternity leaveTuition reimbursementEmployee referral program – cash bonus’PTO + Holidays + extra days (20+ days year-one)FSA + HSA's, Non-med insurances + Teladoc + pet insurance + theft protection + more…", 'Remove dead data files and other irrelevant information to free up database space', 'Perks & Benefits', 'High mathematical ability and above average analytical skills', 'Identify defects, conduct research, develop plan for resolution, and engage appropriate internal resources as necessary', 'We are looking for a talented Data Analyst who truly knows what it means to *know* SQL. ', 'required', 'Expert knowledge of Excel required', 'You Will:', 'Be willing to ask questions, push back as necessary, and ultimately ensure reporting meets stringent expectations', 'ArisGlobal is headquartered in Miami, Florida, with offices located in more than 9 countries around the world.\xa0Please check out our website/LinkedIn Life page for more information about the organization and other available positions.', 'ArisGlobal is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer and considers all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status, national origin, protected veteran status, disability, or any other legally protected class.', 'Collect data from multiple sources and add it to the database', 'Ability to adapt to an Agile/Scrum environment', 'ArisGlobal, ', 'Self-motivated, team player who can also work autonomously']

['', 'Required Education & Experience', '\ufeffPreferred Qualifications', "Bachelor's degree is required. Must be able to multi-task. Must be a self-starter and able to deal effectively with conflict and be able to reach a consensus. Must be able to work under tight deadlines efficiently and with high quality while maintaining a positive attitude and strong work ethic. Proficiency with Microsoft Office suite (especially Excel).", "Are you inquisitive about the What (data), the So What (analysis) and What's Next (recommendations)? Design automated reports and dashboards to empower others to discover and leverage these insights to solve business problems. Develop the knowledge to serve as a programming language subject matter expert for other analysts throughout Customer Services.", 'Ability to analyze information, isolate key issues, and demonstrate logical thought and decisions making. Display intellectual curiosity and desire to solve problems. Good written and oral communication skills. Knowledge or experience with data analysis programming languages and data processing techniques (e.g. SQL, R, Python). Knowledge or experience with data visualization (e.g. Power BI). Basic knowledge of statistical techniques.']

job_title: Digital Data Analyst / Data Insights Analyst
job_text: ['', 'Self Financial, Inc.', 'If you are someone who is equally passionate as we are, we want to chat with you.', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You produce thoroughly vetted analyses, QA your own SQL, and make sure your reporting is easy to comprehend', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa02+ years experience with A/B testing and statistical analysis', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Build dashboards and reports to help us better understand our product lifecycle and feature adoption.', 'This role reports to the Director of Analytics.', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Promote data fluency and data informed decision making throughout the organization', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Team building, happy hours and events (Online now, due to pandemic)', "·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Self pays 100% of employee's monthly medical, dental and vision benefit costs and a portion of dependent insurance coverage", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Downtown Austin office space (Our offices are partially open)', 'If you get excited about using data to improve peoples financial situations then this is the team for you. Our Analytics team utilizes a variety of data, tools, and techniques to do exactly that.', 'We are an Equal Opportunity Employer.', 'Our team is passionate about challenging the status quo of the credit industry by giving people accessible and affordable tools to take control of their credit. Executing on our mission requires deep collaboration across our teams to ensure our products reach the people who can most benefit from them. ', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with data tools such as Segment, Tableau, Redshift', "·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Free at-home workout through Sworkit and Gold's Gym membership", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bonus Program', 'You’ll be partnering with Product, Marketing, Analytics, and Data Engineering teams to enable data informed product decisions. You’ll leverage a combination of technical skills and product intuition to build reports and conduct analyses related to our product experience.', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You’ll have a direct impact on customers ability to improve their financial situation', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You’ll be joining a fast growing startup ', 'There are about 100 million people in the US who have low credit scores or who have no access to credit at all. Sadly, there aren’t many options for these people. Most banks aren’t doing anything material to change the situation because it’s not profitable for them to do so. Bad credit or no credit history can be barriers to renting an apartment or getting certain jobs, let alone buying a car or house. And if you can get a loan with a low credit score, you’re very likely to pay a lot more in interest over the life of that loan.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Monthly $100 COVID stipend for full time employees through 6/2021', 'Our perks include:', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive Pay', ' What we expect', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Buy up options available, costs vary across benefit type', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Remote work arrangements (due to the pandemic)', 'Self Financial requires all employees hired to successfully pass a background check.', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Gain a strong understanding of how our customers use our products, and the outcomes those usage patterns and behaviors drive.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Plenty of snacks and drinks provided at the office', 'About the team and position', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Partner with Product Managers, Marketers, and engineers to identify and address improvements to our product experience.', 'Self Financial, Inc. helps consumers establish and build credit history. We are a venture-backed, financial services startup based in Austin, TX. At Self, our mission is to help millions of people build credit and save money on their journey toward financial security. ', 'What’s exciting about the role', 'Benefits and Perks: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Stock Options', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Enjoy our flexible vacation policy', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Partner with Product, Marketing, Engineering to ensure proper event tracking of features, tests, and products', 'How we act with each other is how we act with our customers. We are direct, transparent and respectful, and we hope you embrace that approach.', "We have the compensation and benefits you expect. But, there's one thing that Self Financial can offer that many startups cannot: we can positively change the world, while making a profit. Over 64 million adults in the U.S. do not have a credit score because of a lack of credit history. Self is solving this problem with creative technology solutions and partnerships.", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Company paid education and training programs', "We're looking for people who share a passion for our mission and relate to why we do what we do.\xa0At Self, we want to work with people who are driven to tackle challenges, bring unique perspectives, find solutions and help make the financial space a better place for our consumers. produce clean data sets', 'Dr. Squatch is looking for a talented Data Analyst to join our Data team. The Data Analyst will be a driving force in creating useful analysis and reporting for teams across Dr. Squatch. By understanding the needs of business leaders and building reporting or creating analyses to meet those needs, the Data Analyst will help teams across the organization spend less time finding data and more time acting on insights gleaned from our data. The Data Analyst will work on a variety of projects and data sources. The analysis and reporting that the Data Analyst creates will inform key decisions across the business. ', 'Problem solver with a sense of urgency', "Dr. Squatch is a high-growth startup changing the game in men's personal care through our all-natural products. We were recently listed as the 325th fastest growing company in the nation by Inc. Magazine and are looking to add talented and motivated people to our team! Our core values come naturally and make us a better, more whole and unique team. We are Scrappy - we get things done, we find a way, we act with urgency and we maintain a start-up mentality. We Play to Win - we have high standards, we encourage ownership of work, we are “hungry” and we invest in the outcome of our work. We have a Team First Mentality - we are humble, help others outside our own wheelhouse, stay positive and have fun. We offer a competitive salary in a growth focused & collaborative team environment. Perks include office gym and pool, snacks, unlimited PTO, and free soap. We're passionate about improving the lives of men and are looking for people who want to join us in our mission!"]

['', '• Work Status: US citizenship required', '• Collaborating with team members to identify opportunities for process improvements, recommend system modifications, and develop policies for data governance', '• Title: Associate, Data Analyst', 'Position Details', '• 90-100% telework (DC/MD/VA area)', '• Using statistical analysis computer languages (Python, R, etc.)', 'Qualifications & Experience:', '• We all have one job: work smart to produce interesting and innovative outcomes', '• BCBS/Guardian options for Health, Dental, Vision, Life', '• We punch above our weight by scaling through software', '• Handling large data sets and relational databases', '• Grade: L3', '• Base Compensation: $90,000 - $110,000', 'Benefits:', '• Team retreats and industry events', '• Referral bonuses for qualified candidates', 'CloudPareto Principles', '• Training reimbursements', 'CloudPareto is a product & consulting startup comprised of highly-motivated professionals that enjoy thinking outside of the box to get work done. We are working to accelerate our nation by helping the Federal government become the most accessible, most valuable, most transparent, and most innovative customer in the world.', 'In this role, you will work in an agile, startup environment developing custom data analytics products to support our client’s strategic goals. You’ll support all phases of analytic work product development, from the identification of key business questions to ETL to delivery of insights to our clients, with a particular focus on the connection between data and the business processes that utilize it. Most importantly, you’ll be part of a passionate team that wants to use their analytical expertise to shape the future of data analytics within the government.', 'CloudPareto Principles:', 'Position Details:', '• We believe that if it’s worth doing, it’s worth doing beautifully and elegantly', '• Start Date: 2-4 weeks', 'Qualifications & Experience', '• 3+ years’ experience supporting analytical product development', '• (Preferred) Knowledge of standard machine learning techniques (classification, clustering, decision trees, recommendation engines, etc.)', '• Visualizing and presenting data to stakeholders using Tableau, Power BI, or another visualization software', '• Annual technology & home office stipend ($2500)', '• Profit sharing', '• Performance Incentive: up to 20%', 'The Associate (L3), Data Analyst, will be tasked with managing complex data sets, developing analytical products, and assisting in the creation and growth of an analytics platform from the ground up for our Federal clients. We believe that data is the central piece to the future of technology and are heavily investing to grow our capability. We do not expect you to be an expert in all aspects of analytical product development, but we do expect that you are willing to seek out and adapt best practices.', '• Designing and maintaining data schemas and databases', '• Using query languages such as SQL, GraphQL, etc.', '• We create world-class products for our world-class Government', '• We are one team and we play to win big', 'Benefits', '• We grow through courage and diversity in our beliefs', '• 100% match up to 6% of 401k contribution, vested immediately', 'This role is part of our “Analytics” workstream that will provide the insight required to drive product development, content strategies, and business decisions. Moreover, you will support the development of the CloudPareto product lineup from a data architecture and product visualization component perspective. If this type of work excites you, we’d love for you to join us.', '• Requirements: Bachelor’s degree (in mathematics, computer science, or another quantitative field), ability to pass a detailed background investigation']

['', '• Ability to clearly communicate technical concepts and analyses with diverse audiences (technical and\xa0 non-technical)', 'What You Will Do\xa0', 'We are looking for an individual who is excited to apply their analytical skills to deliver insights and help\xa0 us make smarter decisions. Your primary focus with be to perform a broad range of business analytics\xa0 tasks, including gathering data from various source systems, interpreting results using various techniques,\xa0 and integrating into an analytics deliverable (e.g. reporting, analysis findings). You’ll help address complex business problems by working with a variety of stakeholders to provide insights derived from data that\xa0 support the decision-making process.\xa0', '• Ability to derive insight from analysis, recommend actions, and communicate with stakeholders ', '• Build dashboards and/or reports and empower the business to answer key questions across various\xa0 functions (e.g. Product, Marketing).\xa0', 'The Prescryptive platform is unique: it knows consumers, guides them with information, engages them in\xa0 their care, and inspires better health. It sends mobile alerts to consumers with personalized information\xa0 and pricing options when it matters most, guiding care discussions with their doctors for more informed\xa0 prescription purchase decisions. For employers and health plans, Prescryptive’s platform is a subscription\xa0 service that helps them empower consumers, cut costs, and inspire better health.\xa0', '• Conduct data collection over variety of sources with varying complexities.\xa0', 'Company Introduction\xa0', 'What We Are Looking For\xa0', '• Experience in methods and tools to query data across disparate sources (e.g. SQL)\xa0 ', '• Perform detailed data analysis, including defining KPIs, determining data structure, data quality, and\xa0 examining source systems.\xa0', '• 3+ years of experience in analytics, statistics, mathematics, or a similar quantitative field • Experience in data analysis and visualization methods and tools (e.g. Excel, Power BI) ', '• Knowledge of relevant data warehouse and data structure concepts (e.g. ETL)', '• Work with product and business teams to identify important questions and answer them with data. ', '• Engage with stakeholders to present analytics efforts and results in clear manner, understandable by\xa0 broad audiences.\xa0', '• Prioritize between multiple planned analytics projects and ad-hoc data requests from internal\xa0 stakeholders.\xa0', '\tPrescryptive Health is putting an end to the nation’s prescription drug debacle by empowering consumers\xa0 to take charge of their medication costs with the world’s first prescription intelligence platform.\xa0 Prescryptive is eliminating middlemen from the drug market by delivering to consumers a simple, mobile\xa0 experience that integrates in real-time with their benefit plans and healthcare providers.\xa0', '• Bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or another relevant field ', 'To learn more about how we are rewriting the script, visit www.prescryptive.com.\xa0', 'Job Description\xa0']

job_title: Data Visualization Analyst, Operations Strategy & Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Proficient knowledge across SQL (TSQL, Google Big Query and Vertica including aggregate functions, joins, etc.) and other structured programming languages (Python, R) and experience with Excel (pivot tables, vlookup, etc.), required', 'Own the end-to-end product development process by running design thinking workshops, developing wireframes, and building front-end dashboards.', 'Become the subject matter expert for data, analytics, and visualization within the Global Operations or Supply Chain organization to ensure accurate and proper interpretation of core business metrics and consumer behavior.', 'Collaborate with other Global Operations areas (e.g., Supplier Operations, Warehousing, Returns, Engineering) to create, share and evaluate project ideas while driving their implementation and scale working solutions across our supply chain.', 'Direct experience and passion for data visualization across tools like Tableau/Looker/DataStudio, required', 'What You’ll Need', 'About Wayfair Inc.', 'Data Visualization Analyst, Operations Strategy & Analytics', 'Solution-oriented, collaborative & curious mindset', 'Identify opportunities and develop recommendations to increase adoption of our tools by monitoring user interaction data.', ' Develop scalable visualization dashboards (i.e. Data Studio, Looker) that help drive decision making and accelerate profitable growth for the Global Operations Supply Chain Team. Identify opportunities and develop recommendations to increase adoption of our tools by monitoring user interaction data. Own the end-to-end product development process by running design thinking workshops, developing wireframes, and building front-end dashboards. Become the subject matter expert for data, analytics, and visualization within the Global Operations or Supply Chain organization to ensure accurate and proper interpretation of core business metrics and consumer behavior. Collaborate with other Global Operations areas (e.g., Supplier Operations, Warehousing, Returns, Engineering) to create, share and evaluate project ideas while driving their implementation and scale working solutions across our supply chain. ', 'Strong written and verbal communication with a team player, highly collaborative attitude', 'High attention to detail and proven ability to manage multiple priorities simultaneously', 'Develop scalable visualization dashboards (i.e. Data Studio, Looker) that help drive decision making and accelerate profitable growth for the Global Operations Supply Chain Team.', 'About Us', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Analytics, Mathematics, Statistics, Information Systems, Economics, Management, Social Sciences or other quantitative discipline field with strong academic record, required.', 'What You’ll Do', 'Experience in design, a plus', ' Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Analytics, Mathematics, Statistics, Information Systems, Economics, Management, Social Sciences or other quantitative discipline field with strong academic record, required. Direct experience and passion for data visualization across tools like Tableau/Looker/DataStudio, required Proficient knowledge across SQL (TSQL, Google Big Query and Vertica including aggregate functions, joins, etc.) and other structured programming languages (Python, R) and experience with Excel (pivot tables, vlookup, etc.), required Experience in a quantitative, consulting, business intelligence, data science or engineering role performing quantitative analysis, a plus. High attention to detail and proven ability to manage multiple priorities simultaneously Solution-oriented, collaborative & curious mindset Strong written and verbal communication with a team player, highly collaborative attitude Experience in design, a plus ', 'Experience in a quantitative, consulting, business intelligence, data science or engineering role performing quantitative analysis, a plus.']

Primary focus is to support NPR’s news, content, sponsorship and marketing divisions. Secondary support for other units as needed and time allows.', 'Interest in and comfort with being part of a “roll up your sleeves” team', 'Demonstrated ability to be a self-starter and problem-solver.', 'EDUCATION:\xa0Bachelor’s Degree.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES\xa0', 'Using the syndicated tools above to support the sponsorship sales efforts.', 'Data analysis skills using Excel, SPSS, or Google Sheets.', 'Four-year college degree in statistics, business, information management, or comparable work experience.Minimum of 2 years work experience in a related field.Demonstrated data analysis, data interpretation and troubleshooting skills.Demonstrated ability to be a self-starter and problem-solver.Eager to learn new skills.Resourceful with a can-do attitude.Interest in and comfort with being part of a “roll up your sleeves” teamData analysis skills using Excel, SPSS, or Google Sheets.Detail orientation.Strong desire to work with databases and numbers.Excellent oral, written, and visual communication skills, particularly at explaining complex quantitative information to non-technical audiences. Training in data visualization is a plus.', 'Does this sound like you? ['', 'For consumers like you, the Bakkt App allows you to aggregate your digital assets to track, spend, and send them in the way that best suits your lifestyle. Bakkt is the only place that puts the power in your hands by enabling all-in-one aggregation. Something like this has never been built before, and we aim to make what was previously thought impossible, possible – leveraging our values of betting big and serving as multipliers on our team. We believe we are more than the sum of our parts and we want you to bet big with us. Now, let’s get to the real reason why you’re here – how we can work together.', '\xa0Identify, analyze, and interpret trends, patterns, and opportunities through analysis of complex data sets across Bakkt productsProvide strategic recommendations on how data/analytics can be leveraged to help achieve company goalsCollect requirements from stakeholders across the organization to develop and document key metrics and build and maintain dashboards for internal users to receive real-time visibility to those metricsIdentify actionable insights to influence product roadmap and strategy based on behavioral/usage data, customer feedback, and external market dataAct as an SME on Bakkt data across all products and systemsDesign and document data models and data flows between Bakkt systems and partner systemsWork with technical architects to extend the Bakkt data ecosystem as our products grow and evolveCompile, prepare, and present findings and insights to internal and external audiencesUnderstand statistical modeling, clustering, and test designSupport marketing automation processes, including customer segmentation using transactional, demographic, psychographic, and behavioral dataEnsure data collection, management, and reporting are in accordance with Bakkt security and compliance requirementsWrite requirements (e.g. to collect data for new use cases), work with engineering teams to implement those requirements, and verify the changesWork with product leads to develop measurable experiments and evaluate resultsVerify the completeness and accuracy of data in source systems, intermediary systems (e.g. data warehouse), and resulting reports and dashboards', 'Bakkt unlocks the $1.2+ trillion of digital assets that is currently held in cryptocurrencies, rewards and loyalty points, gaming assets and merchant stored value. We began in 2018 with the vision to bring trust and transparency to digital assets. Through the Bakkt Warehouse and Bakkt Bitcoin Futures and Options contracts, we serve institutional clients in an end-to-end regulated market with true price transparency. For consumers, Bakkt aggregates digital assets to enable instant liquidity and to empower users to trade, transfer and pay however they want. ['The role primarily is focused on maintaining our project documentation and workflow, resulting in our content being distributed to clients.\xa0\xa0', 'Work within a fast-growing global team of analytically savvy specialists who design projects, which create and leverage "alternative data" to help investment professionals make better decisions.\xa0', '- Can start ASAP\xa0', 'As such, other duties, such as client interaction, problem solving skills, data checking, project design, and creating PowerPoint slides from alternative data, will also be utilized. Highly visible role with room to grow and expand.\xa0', '- Strong Excel and PowerPoint skills\xa0', '- Comfortable with large volumes of manual data entry, but will try to mix things up as much as possible\xa0', 'In addition, at times there will be work to help investigate and prepare aspects of project design.\xa0\xa0', '- Hours: usually 9am-5pm, but sometimes earlier start time (e.g. 7am).\xa0', "- Good attention to detail, with a 'do whatever it takes' to get the job done attitude\xa0", 'The role also maintains the accurate reporting of business KPIs.\xa0\xa0', 'This position provides essential assistance to global sector teams potentially including sectors such as the Tech, Media and Telco (TMT), Healthcare and Industrials.\xa0\xa0', '- Highly organized with accuracy of manual work\xa0', '- Good communication skills (Both written and verbal)\xa0', '\xa0']

job_text: ['', 'o\xa0\xa0\xa0Does this data look right?\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Execute and write SQL queries', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Requires an analytical mindset with the business ', 'o\xa0\xa0\xa0Execute and write queries', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working with Sr. Reporting Analyst & Client Delivery on validating data', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working with the Client Delivery team on validating scripts and data', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Requires great communication', 'Jr. IT Data Analyst – Remote/Hawaii Time Zone ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Someone who is familiar with other programming language with a base knowledge of SQL would be OK', 'Qualifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with Sr. Reporting Analysts on other reoccurring reports where the scripts are already written', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa02-4 years’ experience', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Open to someone with less experience but is strong in the data science realm (SQL, Excel, etc.)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Open to different education backgrounds; needs SQL & Excel to understand and handle day-to-day responsibilities', 'Day-to-day:', 'remotely', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0No client facing responsibilities as Sr. Reporting Analyst will be handling those', 'Candidate:\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Go into the system to validate that the data is being pulled correctly or from the correct sources', 'Location:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Requires advanced Excel experience', 'o\xa0\xa0\xa0Creating pivot tables, vlookups, or graphs', 'AIC is seeking a Jr. IT Data Analyst to support our client in Hawaii remotely.\xa0This person must be available during normal business house in Hawaii but can work remotely in the mainland U.S. or in Hawaii. \xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Supporting Sr. Reporting Analysts with ongoing/new reports', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Potentially presenting data in a format that’s provided – pivot tables or specific graphs', 'o\xa0\xa0\xa0Is this getting pulled from the proper source?\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Open to someone not in Hawaii who will work Hawaii hours', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Requires confidence and familiarity with SQL']

job_title: Data Analyst / Sr Analyst - Strategy, Analytics & Insights
job_text: ['Preferred Qualifications', 'Exceptional Excel/Google Sheets & data management experience', 'Own data analysis and visualization, and communicate the outcomes/insights to various stakeholders to aid strategic decisions for improvements in support experience for drivers and riders', 'Programming languages such as R and/or Python', 'BA/BS/Masters in Economics, Business, Engineering, Operations Research, or other quantitative focus (or equivalent work experience)', 'About The Role', 'Coordinate with other members of the Community Operations Team to measure the impact and efficiency of new products and business processes', 'High-growth analytics or operations experienceExperience working in a support environment (contact management analytics, Zendesk API familiarity, etc.)Experience in reporting-based software, such as Shiny or TableauExceptional Excel/Google Sheets & data management experienceProgramming languages such as R and/or PythonExceptional communication and organization skills Experience focusing on delivering actionable insights to stakeholders and/or customersExperience working on a distributed team', 'Experience in reporting-based software, such as Shiny or Tableau', 'Exceptional communication and organization skills ', 'Note: this is an ongoing job posting, which means your resume will remain on file with us until openings arise. We will not actively provide an update on your application as this is not a formal job posting. If you submit an application, please note we reserve the right to reach out once an opening become available and if a good match. You are highly encouraged to also consider other opportunities in the meantime.***About The RoleThe Analytics & Insights team powers data-driven decision making in Uber’s Community Operations team. As a data analyst on this team, you will shape the experience of customers interacting with support at Uber. Additionally, you will uncover insights from support interactions to drive product and operational improvements.While the A&I team works with all of Uber’s products, the initial focus for this role will be working with the Merchant support team.For this role you should have excellent analytical skills, excellent time-management and organizational habits, and the ability to clearly communicate and present information for stakeholders at all levels of the business.What You’ll DoOwn data analysis and visualization, and communicate the outcomes/insights to various stakeholders to aid strategic decisions for improvements in support experience for drivers and ridersCoordinate with other members of the Community Operations Team to measure the impact and efficiency of new products and business processesDevelop analytical frameworks to support decision making in the US and CanadaPartner closely with specific Lines of Businesses to provide insights that drive decisions around process, policy and service modelBuild, maintain, and communicate detailed reporting & modelsBasic QualificationsMinimum 3 years of experience in analytics, business intelligence, data engineering, or a similar roleBA/BS/Masters in Economics, Business, Engineering, Operations Research, or other quantitative focus (or equivalent work experience)Preferred QualificationsHigh-growth analytics or operations experienceExperience working in a support environment (contact management analytics, Zendesk API familiarity, etc.)Experience in reporting-based software, such as Shiny or TableauExceptional Excel/Google Sheets & data management experienceProgramming languages such as R and/or PythonExceptional communication and organization skills Experience focusing on delivering actionable insights to stakeholders and/or customersExperience working on a distributed teamAbout The TeamThe Community Operations team ensures that we provide high-quality support at scale. The Analytics & Insights team is tasked with providing critical business insights to help identify opportunities and implement operational improvements across our entire organization.Community Operations is pioneering how Uber manages customer support around the globe. The team you will join has one mission: Make Customer Experience our #1 Competitive Advantage. You and your teammates will champion this mission every day until there are no doubts it’s a reality.', 'Build, maintain, and communicate detailed reporting & models', 'What You’ll Do', 'Minimum 3 years of experience in analytics, business intelligence, data engineering, or a similar role', 'Experience focusing on delivering actionable insights to stakeholders and/or customers', 'High-growth analytics or operations experience', 'Experience working on a distributed team', 'About The Team', 'Experience working in a support environment (contact management analytics, Zendesk API familiarity, etc.)', 'Develop analytical frameworks to support decision making in the US and Canada', 'Own data analysis and visualization, and communicate the outcomes/insights to various stakeholders to aid strategic decisions for improvements in support experience for drivers and ridersCoordinate with other members of the Community Operations Team to measure the impact and efficiency of new products and business processesDevelop analytical frameworks to support decision making in the US and CanadaPartner closely with specific Lines of Businesses to provide insights that drive decisions around process, policy and service modelBuild, maintain, and communicate detailed reporting & models', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Minimum 3 years of experience in analytics, business intelligence, data engineering, or a similar roleBA/BS/Masters in Economics, Business, Engineering, Operations Research, or other quantitative focus (or equivalent work experience)', 'Partner closely with specific Lines of Businesses to provide insights that drive decisions around process, policy and service model']

Director of Business Applications Development, vendors, and cross-functional internal departments to identify, document, and cleanse master data sets, system data flows, and/or system data process in current ‘as is’ state, as well as future ‘to be’ state, in support of initial deployment and ongoing maintenance of new technologies, primarily CrunchTime Enterprise Manager.\xa0The primary responsibility of the Recipes Data Analyst is to ensure all the recipes are correctly added and maintained within CrunchTime and linked correctly to the Point of Sale application, ensuring proper This position will mainly interact with Operations, Finance, and IT departments to make sure the recipes housed in the system accurately reflect what is being executed in the field. This position will carry out these tasks in a technical and systematic way to ensure operations has a valuable and user-friendly tool, adopting industry best practices, while also allowing for company growth and scale.\xa0The role will be integral to a new system implementation, and initial data cleansing may be required, along with ongoing system and data maintenance after launch and ongoing.', 'Main Duties and Responsibilities:', '6.\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise in Microsoft Office products; advanced working knowledge of Excel is required.\xa0Knowledge of BI tools and reporting is desired.', 'Provides training on new systems and/or processes.', 'Date:', 'An understanding of Point of Sale applications and the connection between inventory systems and POS via PLU.\xa0Micros and Oracle Simphony experience is a plus.', 'Date:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0January 2021\xa0\xa0', '2.\xa0\xa0\xa0Two+ years of experience within a QSR/retail environment.', '3.\xa0\xa0\xa0Maintains food, beverage, and retail recipes in CrunchTime after a systematic validation/approval process, including sales items and recipe sub-components.\xa0', 'Physical Demands:', '2.\xa0\xa0\xa0Compiles current recipes from national, local and proprietary brands and verifies they are correct with the field operators.', '5.\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong organizational skills for efficient office control are mandatory; must have excellent written and verbal communication skills. Develop and implement databases and data collection systems. Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets. Help identify the business data needed to produce the most useful insights and future analytics. This would include data from our internal business lines and possibly outside sources of data. Acquire data from primary and secondary sources and maintain data systems. Filter and clean data. Use techniques from a range of disciplines, including computer programming, mathematics, and statistics, to draw conclusions from data to describe, predict, and improve various areas of business performance. Support the business in making tactical decisions through reporting and ad hoc queries. Assist with identifying and prioritizing business use cases and information needs. Assist with locating and defining new process improvement opportunities. Be a collaborative partner and team member to our business line stakeholders. Be seen by the business line stakeholders as an extension of their team. Consult on data analytics solutions. Be able to tell the story of how data and analytics is positively impacting stakeholders. Work closely with the business to achieve real value through informed decisions and improved actions. Assist with translating and synthesizing analytics-derived insights into easy-to-understand, actionable recommendations that business users can easily understand. Stay abreast of the latest developments and advancements – and how they could impact Stantec. Assist with the development of documentation, standards, best practices, and workflows for hardware/software in use across the business. Assist with providing oversight and guidance on centralized data management, governance, support, etc. Assist with presenting periodic TechTalk/Spotlight (internal company) webinars throughout the year on the topic of data analytics. Assist with presenting to external audiences as needed. Assist with the incubation of data analytics ideas from various areas of the company. Apply critical thinking skills to develop innovative solutions. Ability to execute highly complex or specialized projects. Attention to detail. Communication, interpersonal skills as applied to a variety of interactions with coworkers, clients, one’s supervisor, etc. sufficient to exchange or convey information and to receive work direction. Ability to apply project management principles. Ability to effectively organize, plan, prioritize, and manage time and competing priorities. Other miscellaneous tasks associated with being a member of the Digital Technology & Innovation team or as assigned by senior members of the team. ['', '• Identifies and documents business strategies, objectives and drivers.', 'JOB SUMMARY:', '• Formulates and defines system scope and objectives through research and fact-finding combined with an understanding of applicable business systems and industry requirements.', '• Trains internal employees or external clients on changes, new systems or new procedures. Conducts one-on-one or classroom training depending upon the size or desire of the audience.', '• Assesses, applies and projects the impact of system changes on users and internal and external clients or stakeholders.', 'Must have qualifications:', '• Re-engineers processes to deliver greater effectiveness and efficiency.', 'A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or the equivalent combination of education, training, or work experience.', '• Performs other related duties as required.', '• Devises or modifies procedures to solve complex problems considering computer equipment capacity and limitations, operation time, and form of desired results.', 'Business industry professionals who elicit, analyze, communicate and validate business/user requirements for processes, policies and information systems. Translate these business needs/end-user requirements into functional specifications that describe what the system, process or product/service must do to fulfill the end-user/business requirements.', '• Uses knowledge of systems and industry requirements to develop or modify complex information systems.', '• Considers the business implications of the application of technology to the current business environment.', 'Disys is looking for Junior Business Analyst with excellent written and communication skills.', '- Typically requires up to three years of Business Analysis experience', '- Great communication and meeting facilitation', '• Calculates/estimates costs and benefits of alternative actions or solutions to establish their viability/ROI.', 'Note: This is remote job but candidate needs to be located in Jacksonville, FL and must be only on W2. No visa sponsorship is provided.', '• Analyzes marketplace, industry, company, technology trends and best practices, vendor products and services, etc.', '\ufeff', '• May mentor, guide, advise and or check the work of less experienced Business Systems Analysts.', 'EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS:', '• Identifies/documents how applications and systems interact to support business processes.', '• Analyzes and documents business processes and metrics, and identifies improvement opportunities.', '• Influences business partners and service providers regarding priorities, hardware/software selection and/or vendor selection.', 'This role will require a lot of email communication, online teams meetings as well as data collection and analysis.', 'GENERAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:', '• Includes analysis of business and user needs, documentation of requirements, and translation into proper system requirement specifications.']

job_text: ['', 'Bachelor in a Quantitative field (Economics preferred).Strong desire to design and develop data processes and reports to support business initiatives.Appropriately communicate technical concepts with people of varying degrees of technical understanding.Basic understanding of databases, SQL, data mining techniques.', 'Eager desire to learn data management concepts and terminology including data warehouse concepts.', 'Perform ad hoc data extraction, analyses and segmentations as required.', 'Write SQL and SAS code to implement technical solutions to execute business strategy / processes.Develop and maintain the monitoring of reports and analytical tools to ensure accuracy, identify trends / issues / opportunities.Perform ad hoc data extraction, analyses and segmentations as required.Work with IT to test new data repositories to support the business.', 'Appropriately communicate technical concepts with people of varying degrees of technical understanding.', 'Preferred', 'Proficiency with MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint).', 'Required', 'About The Job', 'Basic understanding of databases, SQL, data mining techniques.', 'About Us', 'Write SQL and SAS code to implement technical solutions to execute business strategy / processes.', 'What We Offer', 'Strong desire to design and develop data processes and reports to support business initiatives.', 'Work with IT to test new data repositories to support the business.', 'Bachelor in a Quantitative field (Economics preferred).', 'Develop and maintain the monitoring of reports and analytical tools to ensure accuracy, identify trends / issues / opportunities.', 'Eager desire to learn data management concepts and terminology including data warehouse concepts.Proficiency with MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint).']

', ' Who We Are ', 'Deciding how to generate actionable insights from a dataset consisting of payer claims, operational data, app utilization data, quality data, and patient data. Your analysis will support data driven decision making at both the ACO and company level.Working with teams across Aledade to translate your findings into action. You will build interactive dashboards, reports and powerpoints that effectively communicate insights and motivate action among our partner practices. Presenting findings to internal and external audiences, including company executives, product development and ACO operations teams, and clinical staff at Aledade and in our partner practices. Developing scalable data products and processes that enable Aledade’s teams to better understand where and how we need to make process, workflow, and clinical changes in order to achieve our business goals.Thinks beyond their immediate team and contributes to making Aledade holistically better (active engagement in D&I efforts, culture initiatives, facilitating training, leading roundtables, etc.)', 'Strong quantitative skills - Intermediate to Advanced proficiency with Excel and/or Google Sheets Preferred: Familiarity with SQL, R, Tableau, or Python', '2+ years of experience in business analytics, research, or health care', 'Skilled at presenting statistical findings to a wide variety of audiences (company/ACO executives, internal staff, physicians, etc.)', 'Developing scalable data products and processes that enable Aledade’s teams to better understand where and how we need to make process, workflow, and clinical changes in order to achieve our business goals.', 'Working with teams across Aledade to translate your findings into action. You will build interactive dashboards, reports and powerpoints that effectively communicate insights and motivate action among our partner practices. ', '2+ years of experience in business analytics, research, or health careExperience analyzing data and communicating results in data visualizations, dashboards, and reportsSolid understanding of foundational statistical conceptsSkilled at presenting statistical findings to a wide variety of audiences (company/ACO executives, internal staff, physicians, etc.)Strong quantitative skills - Intermediate to Advanced proficiency with Excel and/or Google Sheets Preferred: Familiarity with SQL, R, Tableau, or Python', 'Experience analyzing data and communicating results in data visualizations, dashboards, and reports', 'Deciding how to generate actionable insights from a dataset consisting of payer claims, operational data, app utilization data, quality data, and patient data. ['', 'Ability to maintain a balance between the details & the larger picture', '4+ years of experience in quantitative analysisAbility to maintain a balance between the details & the larger pictureConfident & persuasive written, presentation & oral communication skillsAbility to think independently & communicate ideas effectivelyOrganized with an impeccable attention to detailUnderstanding of statistical modeling & analysis such as classification, clustering, regressions, correlations, probability distributions, etc.Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel including usage of data pivoting, formula writing, logical functions, VBAA sound grasp of reporting tools (Adobe Analytics etc), data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.) & data modeling tools (Datorama, etc.)\xa0Experience with database maintenance & upkeep on platforms like Amazon Web Services (RedShift, S3, EC2, EMR, etc.)Familiarity with quantitative & qualitative consumer research techniques using panel & intercept based surveysKnowledge of CRM toolsBachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Business Analytics, or a similar quantitative major; Master’s degree is a plus but not required', 'Ability to think independently & communicate ideas effectively', 'Confident & persuasive written, presentation & oral communication skills', 'Ask the right questions to understand our client’s challengesWork with key stakeholders to transform business needs into powerful data models, visualizations & dynamic reportsExtract, clean, understand, format & map data to derive insights from client data structures, social reporting, etc.Work closely with integrated teams (account, creative, strategy) to determine KPIs & measurement plansEnhance data collection procedures, identifying gaps & areas of improvementPartner on scoping & designing analytical projects & solutionsCreate repeatable processes to support similar business problems in the futureFoster your own curiosity through self-driven projects that meaningfully inform how we work', 'WHAT YOU’LL NEED', '4+ years of experience in quantitative analysis', 'Foster your own curiosity through self-driven projects that meaningfully inform how we work', 'WHAT YOU’LL DO', 'Understanding of statistical modeling & analysis such as classification, clustering, regressions, correlations, probability distributions, etc.', 'WHO WE ARE', 'Work with key stakeholders to transform business needs into powerful data models, visualizations & dynamic reports', 'Knowledge of CRM tools', 'Organized with an impeccable attention to detail', 'Partner on scoping & designing analytical projects & solutions', 'Work closely with integrated teams (account, creative, strategy) to determine KPIs & measurement plans', 'Experience with database maintenance & upkeep on platforms like Amazon Web Services (RedShift, S3, EC2, EMR, etc.)', '\xa0', 'Create repeatable processes to support similar business problems in the future', 'At MALKA we are an Equal Opportunity Employer M/D/F/V.', 'MALKA is looking for a partner to unearth & speak to the value of data for a variety of audiences. You’ll play an instrumental role in creating compelling & accurate data stories to empower strategic decisions across our diverse roster of clients. Together we’ll work to develop a deeper understanding of their businesses & markets to elevate their projects & roadmaps.', 'A sound grasp of reporting tools (Adobe Analytics etc), data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.) & data modeling tools (Datorama, etc.)\xa0', 'WHO YOU ARE', 'Enhance data collection procedures, identifying gaps & areas of improvement', "MALKA is a creative studio with the instincts of a creative agency, but built on the backbone of an agile production company. We don't just dream it, we create it; because we know how and we have everything we need to do it. We produce feature documentaries, shows, and podcasts, represent talent in the NFL, UFC, and esports, develop ad campaigns and creative for some of the biggest brands in the world, produce daily live streams and entertainment for virtual audiences, and create thousands of pieces of video, design, and animated content across every visual medium that exists. We took what was typically done by multiple vendors and built it under a single roof. Not only does that allow our creatives to expand their capabilities—it elevates every piece of content that comes out of our studio. This is content at the speed of culture. With facilities in Santa Monica, CA, and Jersey City, NJ and over 120 creatives, we plug in anywhere, anytime, on projects large and small, for clients across every industry.", 'MALKA', 'A natural problem solver, you quickly shift from ‘I don’t know’ to ‘What if we…’ and ‘Why don’t we…’ to chart a clear path forward. You don’t take data at face value, leveraging multiple tools to ensure data integrity, layered analysis & qualitative validation. You’re endlessly curious, learning from your peers’ perspectives to develop different approaches & exploring new tools & languages to evolve your insights.', 'Extract, clean, understand, format & map data to derive insights from client data structures, social reporting, etc.', 'Familiarity with quantitative & qualitative consumer research techniques using panel & intercept based surveys', 'Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel including usage of data pivoting, formula writing, logical functions, VBA', 'Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Business Analytics, or a similar quantitative major; Master’s degree is a plus but not required', 'Ask the right questions to understand our client’s challenges']

job_title: Data Analyst role at Chicago IL
job_text: ['', '- 2 + years of technical experience supporting: data analysis, data visualization, data mapping, data modeling, data profiling, or data reporting.', 'We are not able to sponsor visas at this point of time.', 'Sunny', '- Continuously enrich the data catalog by ingesting data from a wide variety of data sources, including relational databases, flat files, unstructured data, NoSQL data, ETL repositories, and reporting repositories: configure data sources, data domains, and their relationships within the data catalog, data governance, and data privacy modules.', '- Ability to dive into issues, debug, analyze, and make recommendations to resolve issues.', 'This role will support the Enterprise Data Office mission to build a centralized repository of technical and business metadata to enable stakeholders across the organization can find the most relevant and trusted data to propel their business initiatives forward. Identification and storage of both technical and business metadata intelligently discover and map relationships between the data through data domains, and enable usage by various enterprise data stakeholders. Utilize the AI/ML features of the data catalog engine to scale to the enterprise. Ensure that the scanned data can be classified and remediated using data domains for data privacy purposes and regulations, including GDPR and CCPA. Enable users of the data to find the most relevant and trusted data for business requirements.', '- Technical support of the data catalog, data governance, and data privacy modules: including user setup, optimizing data scans, monitoring data tool suite, system configuration.', '- Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Information Systems, or another related field.', '- Coordinates application outages with technical and business stakeholders.', '- Ability to travel occasionally, work long hours and meet with vendors and high-level business leaders.', '- Passionate about learning new technologies and applying knowledge gained to solve problems.', '- Continuously improve and optimize data definition, data quality, data profiling, and data lineage functionality within the data catalog and data governance tools.', 'Regards,', '- Collect & understand data flows across the metadata ecosystem, work with data owners, data stewards, and data consumers to remediate issues, and document data mapping within the data catalog and data governance tools.', '(847) 801 6620', 'Essential Functions/Responsibilities', '- Establish data connectors, schedule updates, and monitor services that extract technical metadata from a wide variety of data sources (data warehouses, reporting repositories, etc.).', 'Candidate profile:', '- Collaborate with Enterprise Data Office stakeholders to ensure proper integration of data catalog, data governance, and data privacy tools.', '- Strong written and verbal communication skills, including interpersonal skills and the ability to articulate ideas concisely and clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences.', '- Support Desk Ticket Resolution (Internal and Informatica Ticket Resolution) based on Service Level Agreements (SLAs)', '- Strong data analysis and problem-solving skills are required to analyze system architecture, data models, and must have deep appreciation for data standards and quality.', '- Create, maintain, and administer the data catalog, data governance, and data privacy access model to ensure proper role-based groups can access the right information.', '- Knowledge and general understanding of the concepts and techniques of data architecture.', '- Ability to work with cross functional teams, perform root cause analysis and resolve issues in a fast-paced environment.', 'Technical Responsibilities:', '- Broad technical skills necessary, with a solid understanding of data systems and infrastructure.', '- Ability to express complex technical concepts effectively verbally and in writing.', 'Primary Purpose: The Data Analyst will be responsible for the enrichment and maintenance of enterprise data tools - data catalog, governance, and privacy; Including connecting to data systems and applications throughout the organization, tagging and curating the data assets, establishing automatic and manual data lineage.', '- Previous hands-on experience with ETL, data profiling, and data lineage tools – a plus.', '- Establish system monitors, manage upgrades, and patch releases for data catalog, data governance, and data privacy tools.', 'Primary Purpose: ']

['', 'The volume and breadth of available data has exploded in recent years, making the role fast-paced, dynamic and imperative to our success.\xa0Our analysts work closely with quantitative researchers and data engineers to incorporate data insights into our strategies.\xa0Analysts are expected to analyze large datasets for quality, consistency and potential value by writing simple code and utilizing visualization tools. Additionally, we rely on analysts’ judgment to confirm the accuracy and utility of data by cross-referencing information across a variety of independent sources.\xa0', 'Vendor Interaction - Ability to work with external entities to solve problems and understand data.', 'Programming - SQL and Python proficiency are desirable. An excellent candidate would have demonstrated experience in this area.', 'Visualization - Tableau (or similar) proficiency is desirable.\xa0At the very least, candidates must demonstrate an aptitude and desire to learn.', 'Successful candidates will demonstrate a methodical and rigorous approach as well as a creative and flexible mindset.\xa0The following attributes and skill-sets are desirable:', 'Data Analyst / Data Engineer / Data Quality', 'Communication - Effectively communicate ideas and conclusions from analysis through written communication and in group presentations.', 'Attention to Detail - Demonstrate a problem-solving approach which entails detecting subtle changes which are exhaustively explored until the root cause is determined and nuances are understood.', 'Intellectual Curiosity - Enjoy tackling challenging problems and developing and honing the necessary skills to do so.', 'Princeton, NJ', 'Intellectual Curiosity - Enjoy tackling challenging problems and developing and honing the necessary skills to do so.Attention to Detail - Demonstrate a problem-solving approach which entails detecting subtle changes which are exhaustively explored until the root cause is determined and nuances are understood.Programming - SQL and Python proficiency are desirable. An excellent candidate would have demonstrated experience in this area.Visualization - Tableau (or similar) proficiency is desirable.\xa0At the very least, candidates must demonstrate an aptitude and desire to learn.Vendor Interaction - Ability to work with external entities to solve problems and understand data.Communication - Effectively communicate ideas and conclusions from analysis through written communication and in group presentations.', 'Data is a critical part of our business and influences every aspect of the work that we do. To help our team gain deeper insights and unlock hidden value within our data, we are searching for a talented analyst with a passion for solving challenging, open-ended problems and discovering subtle, intricate details.']
