['', 'Ability to create balancing and reconciliation protocols on the fly', 'Knowledge of Asset Types and Financial Products (Fixed Income, Equity, etc..)', 'JOB DESCRIPTION:', 'PLEASE READ THE JOB DESCRIPTION BEFORE APPLYING!!!', 'Candidates for the Data Operations Analyst position require strong skills in SQL, working knowledge of brokerage back office operations and strong pattern recognition skills. Interpersonal communication skills both written and verbal are also required as the Data Operations Analyst will frequently find her-or-him-self interfacing with others regarding methods toward to most accurate and efficient processing decisions.', 'DUE TO FULLTIME STATUS, ONLY US CITIZENS AND GREEN CARD HOLDERS NEED APPLY! NO 3RD PARTY VENDORS AND RECENT GRADS! ', 'Willingness to seek guidance as necessary', 'Confidence in decision making', 'Ability to conduct root cause analysis on data issue', 'ONLY QUALIFIED LOCAL CANDIDATES WITH BACK OFFICE OPERATIONS, FIXED INCOME OR EQUITIES, SQL AND EXCEL EXPERIENCE NEED APPLY!\xa0', 'Proficient in Excel, Microsoft Word and ability to write SQL Queries', 'Multi-tasking abilities are required. The position involves regular interface with senior leadership and exposure to sensitive information. Tact, diplomacy and sound business and interpersonal judgment are a must. Requires the ability to self-organize and flexibility with respect to Blotter processing hours.', 'The Data Operations Analyst is not a "button pusher. The role requires decision making at multiple steps of an array of possible processing paths. It also requires a temperament that is self-confident enough to act on its own, yet willing to consider and even seek out the advice of others in an effort to achieve 100% processing accuracy.', 'Data Operations Analysts will find that their role is 60% to 70% process adherence/observance and 30% to 40% process improvement/re-engineering. The Data Operations Group believes that the discovery of new and better logic toward speedier more accurate processing is a journey that has just begun. T', 'UPON APPLYING, PLEASE ATTACH YOUR UPDATED RESUME ', "Ability to collaborate with developers and other technical personnel to ensure adherence to business requirements and stakeholders' needs", 'Skill sets & knowledge areas of a prospective a Data Operations Analyst are as follows:', 'Data Operations Analyst is responsible for the in-take and successful processing of Trade blotters and other machine readable submissions.', '\ufeff', 'Ability to collaborate with project team to ensure timely delivery and quality of all project deliverables', 'TITLE:\xa0Junior Data Operations Analyst (Back Office)', 'Ability to facilitate and/or participate in joint analysis and design sessions to understand needs of the next-stage and downstream users', 'Ability to conceptualize and think creatively', 'DURATION:\xa06 months project with a possible conversion to an FTE', 'Knowledge of Brokerage Back Office operations', "Knowledge of Brokerage Back Office operationsKnowledge of Asset Types and Financial Products (Fixed Income, Equity, etc..)Confidence in decision makingWillingness to seek guidance as necessaryAbility to create balancing and reconciliation protocols on the flyAbility to conceptualize and think creativelyAbility to collaborate with project team to ensure timely delivery and quality of all project deliverablesAbility to conduct root cause analysis on data issueAbility to collaborate with developers and other technical personnel to ensure adherence to business requirements and stakeholders' needsAbility to facilitate and/or participate in joint analysis and design sessions to understand needs of the next-stage and downstream usersProficient in Excel, Microsoft Word and ability to write SQL Queries", 'LOCATION:\xa0NY, NY']

An employee with a disability needs an accommodation to perform the essential job duties or to gain access to the workplace. An employee with a disability needs an accommodation to receive equal access to benefits, such as details, training, and office-sponsored events. ['', '• Partner with a cross-functional, including external resources, to continually improve our ability to measure and evaluate behavior and business metrics\xa0', '• Pull data from corporate and/or division systems as needed', '• Ensure rollouts and best practices support and align with the Customer 1st strategy', '• May require 3+ years’ experience using Power BI, Adobe Analytics Tableau, or other industry leading analytics tools for reporting/ connecting and data visualizations\xa0', 'Key Responsibilities', '• Coding skill languages such as SQL, R, NoSQL Hadoop and/ or Python\xa0', '• Support a data-driven culture, educating the digital organization on everyday use of data as a resource\xa0', '• Travel to divisions and stores to observe, create performance measurements and summarize observations.', '• Demonstrated ability to present actionable insights to business stakeholders\xa0', '\xa0BCForward is looking for a\xa0Data Analyst- Junior for our client in Cincinnati, OH.', '• Develop and maintain store/department savings estimate model and database', '• Summarize and communicate an analysis that provides best practices recommendations to the business owner and team', '• Supervise and coach direct reports in the performance of their duties; complete performance reviews and provide feedback to direct reports\xa0', 'Analyst will work cross-functionally utilizing data from multiple sources to solve business problems and optimize profits. They will lead the process of requirements gathering via measurement plans that allows actionable insights from complex sets of information/data, ensure quick decision making and opportunities for improvements focusing on what information is appropriate as levers and actionable KPIs. Present findings to all levels of the business with actionable and money saving opportunities called out.', 'Additional Info from the Manager:', 'Manage and develop best practices and projects to achieve results. Responsible for the management of data, including gathering, summarizing, and analyzing the data necessary for best practices development and rollout. Summarize the business impact and communicate an analysis of the data globally and at a high level.', '• Travel to work campuses to attend company meetings\xa0', '• Manage and act as key technical advisor on Adobe Analytics, Power BI, and other reporting tools to analyze and identify opportunities for improvements\xa0', '• Perform selected and/or required key analysis as needed', '• Ability to identify opportunities and act on them using both problem solving skills and analytical skills\xa0', '• Demonstrate leadership within the team structure and during activities', '• Create management capabilities and processes that sustain continuous improvement', '• Measure usability/effectiveness, and present actionable insights and recommendations based on data results and best practices\xa0', '• Assist in providing guidance and recommendations for measurements of success, KPI strategy, and health measurements across various business units\xa0', '• Build custom analytics dashboards and reports that can effectively present digital performance to the appropriate audiences aligned to KPIs working with teams to process the information. Combining data sources and complex queries.\xa0', '• Ability to prioritize projects with minimal supervision; must be impeccably organized\xa0', '• Knowledge of data gathering, cleaning, and transforming techniques\xa0', '• Experience with commercial behavioral data, e-Commerce, navigation/path analysis, search, and testing methodologies\xa0', '• Must be able to perform the essential functions of this position with or without reasonable accommodation', '• Perform end-to-end analysis to identify key drivers of emerging trends and recommending actions to all levels of the business\xa0', '• Guide meetings with stakeholders to identify measurement plans and key performance indicators (KPIs) for their areas and build dashboards for self-service with graphs, info graphs, and other methods of visualizations.\xa0', '• Bachelor’s degree/college diploma in Data Analytics, Statistics, Marketing, Information Science, Computer Engineering or related field, preferred\xa0', '• Ability to work on multiple tasks simultaneously while successfully meeting established goals and deadlines\xa0', '• Maintain store and/or department-level database']

['', 'This resource will be assigned an application from the team lead, then they will take existing templates for data dictionaries/front end data driven control catalogs, and start building these artifacts for each application', '(DMC3)', 'They will take technical metadata and then use existing standards and apply them to come up with business names of technical metadata elements and create business definitions\xa0', 'This person needs to love working in excel', 'Location: ', '\xa0', 'This team is not automated yet – so someone who loves SQL will NOT be a fit here', 'This person will work with various SMEs and managers - they will reach out to tech teams for technical pieces and they also need to speak with business analysts\xa0– so communication and relationship building is necessary', 'Day to day: Execution of data governance related to meta data and data quality.', '\ufeffPosition Responsibilities', 'Past Experience/ Required qualifications', '10+ years of experience with data governance/data quality/ and metadata work', 'Location: Charlotte, Minneapolis, Dallas, Tempe/Phoenix, Atlanta, Des Moine\xa0', '5 applications can be assigned to a person at a time that are in different status’ – they may be building a dictionary for one application, while completing a DQ assessment for another application.', 'Their peer team ingests and consumes data, then the decision must be made to either enter data into the lake or off the lake into an APP(Authorized Provisioning Point)\xa0', 'Once their peer team approves data entry to lake or APP then this team utilizes governance standards to improve the quality of data before going into the lake or the APP', 'Tools: ', 'Mastery of Excel- pivot tables, VBA, VlookUps, etc.\xa0', '\ufeffPosition Responsibilities:\xa0']

We are looking for detail-oriented individuals from diverse backgrounds with demonstrated quantitative and problem-solving skills. ['', 'A successful candidate will be consumer minded, data curious, and action oriented. They will eagerly tackle varied work assignments that frequently require interpretation and independent determination of the appropriate courses of action. The assignments involve moderately complex to complex issues where the analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors and pushing through ambiguity to deliver concrete value on time to stakeholders.', '• Experience using voice of customer (VOC) and/or other consumer experience (CX) measurement systems data', '• Experience using clickstream and other digital telemetry data as inputs for analysis', '• Preferred but not required: Experience working in a heavily regulated industry such as healthcare, finance, insurance, government, etc.', 'Louisville, KY or remote (CST or EST only)', 'Required Qualifications', 'Required experience:', 'The Market Research Analyst will utilize tools, technologies, processes and best practices to collect, integrate, analyze, and present a wide array of market intelligence resources in order to create insightful and actionable business information. These resources are both qualitative and quantitative, including but are not limited to: competitive intelligence portals and reports, competitive benchmarking data, consumer behavior and sentiment data, industry whitepapers, and relevant academic articles.', '• Enhance competitive intelligence reports and data streams with an understanding of the digital business strategy and roadmap, elevating insights to be both more specific and actionable than what would otherwise be available “off the shelf”. This should be done as a blend of qualitative assessment and quantitative analysis of available sources pertinent to the most pressing development decisions at any given time.', 'Our healthcare client is seeking a data-minded digital strategist to be part of Digital Experience Solutions, a unit in Digital Health & Analytics that develops digital products to serve the needs of our diverse consumer and business stakeholders. The position’s primary role is to apply a multi-disciplinary approach to supporting decision making in digital product development teams from design to delivery of fully developed products that are ready for customer use.', '• Succinctly deliver complex analysis/findings in a manner that conveys understanding, influences senior executives, garners support for recommendations, drives business decisions, and influences business strategy.', "Bachelor's degree and 3 years of progressively responsible experience required", 'LONG TERM ASSIGNMENT WITH OPPORTUNITY TO BE EXTENDED BUT CANNOT BE GUARANTEED', '\xa0', '• Experience working with and influencing diverse stakeholder groups, including developers, strategists, creatives, and leaders', 'Our client is seeking candidates who demonstrate the ability to identify and gather the relevant and quality data sources required to fully answer and address the problem for the recommended strategy. Interrogate, integrate, and transform disparate data sources to arrive at unique and compelling insights', 'Role & Responsibilities:', "Bachelor's degree in Business or closely related field and 3 years of progressively responsible, post-graduate experience OR Master's degree in Business or closely related field and 2 years of related experience.", '• Strong proficiency in market intelligence platforms and demonstrated ability to translate general market insights into specific business insights for your stakeholders.', '• Experience with data collection, transformation, management, analysis, and in using common analytics methods and tools.', '• Design, implement and maintain regular recurring readouts to stakeholders, relying on multiple data sources to report on consumer and competitive trends for individual business lines, digital experiences, visitor segments, and relevant marketing campaigns.', '• Develop and nurture collaborative partnerships with key stakeholders to identify questions that require competitive and consumer data insights to answer. Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, consolidate and validate business assumptions relevant to the solution strategy, prior to initiating and throughout the analytical process.', '• Identify and gather the relevant and quality data sources required to fully answer and address the problem for the recommended strategy. Interrogate, integrate, and transform disparate data sources to arrive at unique and compelling insights.', '• Work with business intelligence engineers to identify user friction points in their digital experience (via data analysis) and communicate clearly these problems and next steps in recommended analysis.', 'The candidate will work closely with Business Intelligence Engineers to provide digital product teams with well-rounded insights that help them make the most effective decisions for developing winning solutions in the health and wellness marketplace.', 'No C2C, only W2']

in utilizing Microsoft computer applications related to the job such as Word, Excel and Outlook as well as Google Earth or other mapping programs.', 'Gather, translate, and transmit crash data.This position is responsible for ensuring police crash reports, state vehicle registration files, state driver licensing files, state highway department data, vital records department data, death certificates, coroner/medical examiner reports, and emergency medical service reports are collected, processed and reported in a timely and accurate manner to the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.Under general supervision, exercise independent judgement and initiative to perform administrative and advanced crash study analysis in support of the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration’s.Requires training and experience-developed knowledge in a program area to interpret and apply pertinent policies, procedures and/or specifications.May serve as primary contact and information source for assigned unit or program.The job requires attention to detail to ensure the correct information is provided to assist with future traffic improvement related program.The perspective candidate must be able to communicate with various law enforcement / governmental personnel to insure all the information is correct and accurate.It requires a quiet professional work-at-home environment where work can be completed without disruptions.', 'Gather, translate, and transmit crash data.', 'Requires training and experience-developed knowledge in a program area to interpret and apply pertinent policies, procedures and/or specifications.', 'The perspective candidate must be able to communicate with various law enforcement / governmental personnel to insure all the information is correct and accurate.']

['', 'Who we are: automotiveMastermind (aM) provides U.S. automotive dealers with software and marketing solutions to improve the efficiency of the vehicle sales process. The company’s cloud-based technology helps dealers more precisely predict automobile buying behavior and facilitates microtargeted customer communications to improve the efficiency of the sales process and strengthen customer retention. ', '• You have five or more years of relevant and “hands-on” work experience in the realm of data warehouse projects including source data analysis, data modeling and associated source to target mapping and data analysis in the automotive, finance, marketing or retail domains. ', 'Who you are:', '• Predicting when existing consumers will be ready for their next vehicle based on a prior vehicle, sharpening the focus on high-potential targets ', '• You routinely exhibit the requisite characteristics for professional growth and success: ownership, mastery, initiative, and teamwork ', 'Who you are: ', '• Partnering with Data Strategy, Product and Operations teammates to design robust data-driven business processes around outreach, measurement/attribution, and the creation of derived variables ', 'Core responsibilities of the data management sub-team include … ', 'The following statements describe the type of individual who will be successful in this role: ', '• You can translate concepts into working prototypes and prototypes into engineering requirements • You have demonstrated success in collaborating with cross-functional teams ', '• Delivering a compelling offer to engage the customer and prompt a return to the participating dealership ', '• Automotive industry knowledge is a plus, but curiosity is a requisite', '• Participating in data governance processes to prevent unapproved changes to table schemas, dimensional tables, etc… ', '• Assimilating data from multiple sources, deconstructing and describing existing business logic, and supporting ad hoc analyses ', '• Providing a platform to support dealer outreach and dialogue aM was acquired by IHS Markit in 2017. ', '• Connecting dealers to conquest opportunities ', '• You can demonstrate technical mastery of core data tools: o Solid SQL and Excel skills o Demonstrated proficiency with Python/R and Tableau/PowerBI/Data Studio o Experience with cloud-based computing (GCP/AWS/Mongo) ', 'automotiveMastermind (aM) delivers value to the market by… ', 'Who we are: ', '• Creating and leading the implementation of enterprise data management plans, ensuring information from across sources/systems is structured for optimal flexibility and ease of use ', 'What you will do: The aM Data Strategy team supports data-centric functions for automotiveMastermind, including Data Management, Data Integration & Quality, Data Analytics and Data Science. The team seeks a key player to support the Data Management sub-team in enabling efficient, high-quality processes through the implementation of robust data structures and data management principles. ', 'What you will do: ', 'IHS Markit harnesses deep sources of information, analytics and expertise to forge solutions for the industries and markets that drive global economies. Our company partners with clients in business, finance and government to provide the unrivalled insights and perspectives that lead to well-informed, confident decisions. We call this The New Intelligence. IHS Markit serves more than 50,000 key customers in more than 140 countries, including 80 percent of the Fortune Global 500. We help decision makers apply higher-level thinking to daily tasks and strategic issues across a host of industries and disciplines including energy, finance, automotive, engineering, technology, maritime and trade, chemical, and economics and country risk. Headquartered in London, IHS Markit (Nasdaq: INFO) is committed to sustainable, profitable growth. ', '• You are either highly technical with analytical prowess or deeply analytical with technical prowess • You are capable of not only extracting and transforming data, but also of forming judgment over its validity based on relationships within and across related data sets ', '• Collaborating with Data Strategy teammates to design, test, assess and adapt data validation strategies ', 'Job Description: Data Analyst, Data Management', '• You possess a Bachelors’ degree or Masters’ degree in a technical or quantitative discipline (math, engineering, statistics, computer science, or finance) ', '• Experience in designing or using high-quality dimensional data warehouses and data-driven decision-making processes is highly desirable ', '• You know your facts from your dimensions and can apply best practices to accommodate evolving data assets, establish appropriate standards, and validate alignment between implementation and design ', '• Producing engineering requirements to enable the production implementation of approved data models, validation protocols, and derived data creation processes ']

['', '• Microsoft Excel skills', '• Experience with databases and dashboard tools', '• Experience with reporting detailed and summary status, milestones, and deliverables for project assignments', 'Requirements and Job Responsibilities', 'Mission: To help executives make informed housing industry investment decisions.', '• Monitor trends in economic and real estate markets', 'Purpose: To enable the profitable development of the best places to live in the world through great research.', 'Our Company', '• Ability to learn independently and quickly', '• Ability to consolidate and synthesize large amounts of data from various sources; must be able to translate a large group of raw numbers into succinct presentation points', 'John Burns Real Estate Consulting, LLC provides independent subscription research and customized consulting services related to the US housing industry. John Burns\xa0founded the company in 2001 because he saw a need for better housing market analysis. The company has grown to a highly passionate team of research analysts and consultants in offices across the country, who work together to provide the most trusted source of US housing analysis and consulting services. Three principles guide us:', 'If you enjoy challenges, take great pride in accuracy and professional appearance in all the work you complete, and enjoy working with a fantastic team that supports each other, this is the dynamic environment for you.\xa0', '• Experience creating SQL queries for retrieving data', ' Additional Desired Qualifications a Plus, but Not Required:', 'Purpose: To enable the profitable development of the best places to live in the world through great research.Vision: To be the most trusted and respected US housing market analysts and consultants.Mission: To help executives make informed housing industry investment decisions.', '• Strong analytical skills, problem solving ability, and written and oral communication skills are required.', 'Purpose', '• Collect, filter, and graph relative real estate performance and fundamentals data', 'All applicants should submit a cover letter and resume.', '• Experience with R statistical software', '• Interested in real estate, demographic, and related data', 'Vision', '• Attention to detail with the ability to check your own work', 'Mission', '• Ability to work both independently and collaboratively', '• Minimum 2 years of work experience in a research or data analysis environment', ' Required Skills', 'John Burns', '• Develop and generate standard reporting', '• A passion for the data analysis profession', '• Demonstrate critical thinking and initiative, reaching out to other team members and data providers in search of answers', '• Support the production of monthly market reports and research papers', 'Vision: To be the most trusted and respected US housing market analysts and consultants.', 'We are looking for an analyst who is curious and methodical to help us expand our data, research, and analysis capabilities. This position is based out of Sacramento (Folsom), California, and is part of our national team that advises real estate executives with strategic planning, market and consumer research, and trusted analysis. This position requires an individual who is organized, self-motivated, and has demonstrated the ability to support multiple projects. The candidate must be able to work independently and react quickly to changing priorities. Candidate must be in the Sacramento market area.', 'John Burns Real Estate Consulting offers a comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, vision, 401(k) with employer contributions, paid vacation, holiday leave, training, etc. Compensation will be based on a candidate’s market value and their ability to contribute to our business. Please visit our website for more information on the company: www.realestateconsulting.com.', '• Statistical or data analysis experience', '• Bachelor’s degree', '• Data analyst or related experience; experience in reporting and data mining as well as the ability to analyze large sets of data', '• Ability to format and validate data']

['', 'Develop a deep understanding of Live Person’s data API architecture and data mappings.Design data models and product requirements for messaging and AI that integrate into brands’ operations systems.Contribute to and extend Live Person’s primary data delivery tool, Data Transporter.Own product analytics and usage tracking for the WFM product suite.Work cross-functionally across engineering, product, and business teams to translate business problems to product requirements.Extend Live Person’s WFM product suite in a way that supports conversational commerce, leveraging data from messaging, AI, and intent, and data science spaces.Assist our engineers in designing a data architecture that supports speed and innovation in development.Work with innovative technologies incorporating AI, machine learning and conversational interfaces.', 'Design data models and product requirements for messaging and AI that integrate into brands’ operations systems.', 'Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or another quantitative field.', 'You can read more about LivePerson and Our Principles here - https://www.liveperson.com/company/#guiding-principals', 'About the Role:', 'Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'Our company believes equal opportunities for both genders is something that has been overlooked for too long.', 'Experience working backwards from the customer and delivering innovative, simple solutions.', 'Extend Live Person’s WFM product suite in a way that supports conversational commerce, leveraging data from messaging, AI, and intent, and data science spaces.', 'Develop a deep understanding of Live Person’s data API architecture and data mappings.', '4+ years of experience in an analyst capacity working with databases, SQL.', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring as well as working familiarity with a broad range of databases.', 'In this role you will:', 'To shake up the industry, LivePerson CEO Robert Locascio recently launched the Equal AI initiative - established to focus efforts on eradicating gender bias in AI engineering. We are also keen on getting women enthusiastic about software engineering by sponsoring “WomenHack” and “Female’s Favor{IT}e Conference” events globally.', 'We want you to feel part of our LivePerson family.\xa0', 'Advanced experience with Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets; this will be key to creating mock data architecture and iterating on designs.', 'Own product analytics and usage tracking for the WFM product suite.', 'Work cross-functionally across engineering, product, and business teams to translate business problems to product requirements.', 'We are looking for an  Data Analyst II to build and expand our workforce management (WFM) product suite. This is a critical area of functionality that is necessary for the world’s largest brands to run contact center operations at scale. The role will work across Live Person’s data ecosystem, mapping and defining data points that will ultimately become scalable feeds that integrate into brands’ WFM platforms. The result is that brands will have the data they need to staff and contact centers around messaging and AI, just like they do today for voice and chat. Going further, this role will help us develop the architecture to further embed AI, science, and machine learning into contact center operations so that brands can innovate at scale.', 'Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages, preferably Python.', 'Over the next three years, our goal is to transform the 268 billion analogue phone calls between a brand and it’s consumers to digital on the LiveEngage platform. By doing this, we enable consumers to get back time and experience a more connected relationship with the brand in which sales, service, marketing, branches, stores, and contact centre’s become a unified experience.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Contribute to and extend Live Person’s primary data delivery tool, Data Transporter.', 'Demonstrated ability to work closely with teammates in a highly collaborative environment and simultaneously be a self-starter with strong individual contributions.', '4+ years of experience in an analyst capacity working with databases, SQL.Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring as well as working familiarity with a broad range of databases.Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages, preferably Python.Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or another quantitative field.Advanced experience with Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets; this will be key to creating mock data architecture and iterating on designs.Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.Demonstrated ability to work closely with teammates in a highly collaborative environment and simultaneously be a self-starter with strong individual contributions.Strong written communication; our culture lays emphasis on writing skills, and narratives are how we communicate strategy to partners and stakeholders.\xa0Experience working backwards from the customer and delivering innovative, simple solutions.', 'Frequent team events, daily breakfast and happy hours on occasion (and there are lots of those) will help you settle quickly into your new workplace.. And - our holiday parties are a blast!', '.\xa0', 'Your qualifications are:', 'Assist our engineers in designing a data architecture that supports speed and innovation in development.', 'Work with innovative technologies incorporating AI, machine learning and conversational interfaces.', 'We care about you.', '\xa0LivePerson is the global leader in conversational commerce solutions and we aim to make life easier by transforming how people communicate with brands. Our 18,000 customers, including leading brands like Citibank, HSBC, Orange, Virgin Atlantic, RBS and Liberty Global, use our conversational commerce solutions to orchestrate humans and AI, at scale, and create a convenient, deeply personal relationship — a conversational relationship — with their millions of consumers.', 'LivePerson works hard to create a positive employee experience. Your life outside of the office is important to us. We support our teams with great benefits, like pension plans, paid parental leave, and a competitive of paid time-off\xa0that enables our family to take the time they need to recharge.', 'Strong written communication; our culture lays emphasis on writing skills, and narratives are how we communicate strategy to partners and stakeholders.\xa0', ' Data Analyst II ', 'Liveperson is an expert based culture, built on the drive and passion of smart people! Our business is growing and we are looking for people like you!', 'Our company believes equal opportunities for both genders is something that has been overlooked for too long.\xa0']

['', 'Enthusiasm for astronomy, natural science, data science, and computingGood written and oral communication skillsAble to thrive as part of a teamMotivation to support scientific usersFamiliarity with astronomical data, algorithms, and software (imaging, photometry, spectroscopy, astrometry, IRAF, Astropy)', 'As a recipient of U.S. Government funding, AURA is considered a government contractor and is subject to Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action regulations. As an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer, AURA does not discriminate based on race, sex, color, age, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity/gender identity expression, lawful political affiliations, veteran status, disability, and/or any other legally protected status under applicable federal, state, and local equal opportunity laws.', '.', 'Working as part of a team to achieve NOIRLab’s scientific mission goals through software, data, and computing systemsWorking with researchers in support of their science projectsDeveloping and operating software-based procedures for astronomical data analysisInvestigating, testing, and comparing different tools for astronomical data analysisOperating data reduction pipelinesIngesting data into archives and databasesCreating and maintaining scientific tutorial scripts and code notebooksDesigning, developing, and maintaining web pages and web interfacesResponding to helpdesk inquiries from the astronomy research community', 'Proficiency in three or more of the following areas:', 'The Association of Universities for Research in Astronomy (AURA), is a consortium of over 40 US institutions and three international affiliates that operates world-class astronomical observatories. AURA’s role is to establish, nurture, and promote public observatories and facilities that advance innovative astronomical research. AURA is responsible for managing the operations of the NSF’s NOIRLab, the National Solar Observatory, and the construction of the Vera C. Rubin Observatory and the Daniel K. Inouye Solar Telescope under cooperative agreements with the National Science Foundation and operations of the Space Telescope Science Institute under contracts with NASA.\xa0\xa0', 'We are committed to diversity and inclusion at NOIRLab.\xa0Our managing organization, AURA, as a leader in the astronomical community, develops and supports programs that advance our organizational commitment to diversity, broaden participation, and encourage the advancement of diversity throughout the astronomical scientific workforce. Learn more at\xa0http://www.aura-astronomy.org/diversity.asp', 'Good written and oral communication skills', 'Computer operating systems (Mac OS, UNIX, Linux, Windows)', 'Statistics and error analysis', 'Veterans, disabled individuals or wounded warriors needing assistance with the employment process should request assistance at employment@aura-astronomy.org\xa0', 'AURA offers an excellent benefits package including paid time off and retirement plan contributions, competitive salary commensurate with experience, and a very attractive work environment.', 'Image and signal processing', 'Teams within CSDC support open access by researchers across the globe to some of the world’s largest and most advanced astronomical telescopes and data sets. Current CSDC projects include the Astro Data Lab (an online platform for scientific analysis with large public astronomy data sets), the ANTARES alert broker (a software platform enabling real-time analysis of live-streaming astronomy data), the Astro Data Archive (a petabyte-scale archive of images from some of the world’s most powerful astronomical telescopes and cameras), the US National Gemini Office (a team providing user support and software resources for US-based users of the twin 8-meter telescopes of the Gemini Observatory), and the NOIRLab Time Allocation program (which reviews proposals from researchers requesting observing time on ground-based optical and infrared telescopes funded by the US National Science Foundation.)', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in astronomy, physics, computer science, or related field, plus 2-3 years’ experience in data analysis and/or scientific research support. Master’s degree may be substituted for 1-2 years’ experience.Initiative, judgement, integrity, and problem-solving skillsProficiency in three or more of the following areas:Data visualizationImage and signal processingStatistics and error analysisRelational and non-relational database systemsManagement of unstructured data setsMachine learning and artificial intelligenceRelevant programming languages (Python, C/C++, Java)Computer operating systems (Mac OS, UNIX, Linux, Windows)Web page design, creation, and maintenanceAnalysis and understanding of science user goals', 'Working with researchers in support of their science projects', 'Web page design, creation, and maintenance', 'Able to thrive as part of a team', 'Responding to helpdesk inquiries from the astronomy research community', 'Designing, developing, and maintaining web pages and web interfaces', 'Operating data reduction pipelines', 'Developing and operating software-based procedures for astronomical data analysis', '\xa0', 'Motivation to support scientific users', 'Creating and maintaining scientific tutorial scripts and code notebooks', 'Working as part of a team to achieve NOIRLab’s scientific mission goals through software, data, and computing systems', 'Travel is not required, but opportunities will be available to travel to the various NOIRLab observatory sites (Arizona, Chile and Hawai`i).', 'Initiative, judgement, integrity, and problem-solving skills', 'Relational and non-relational database systems', 'Enthusiasm for astronomy, natural science, data science, and computing', 'Data Analyst.', 'The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.', "Preference will be given to qualified internal candidates and qualified Native Americans living on or near the Tohono O'odham reservation.\xa0", 'The position will remain open until filled. To be considered in the first round of reviews, please submit your application by April 2, 2021.', 'Ingesting data into archives and databases', 'Investigating, testing, and comparing different tools for astronomical data analysis', 'This work is mostly carried out in an office environment. Long periods of sitting may be required. ', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in astronomy, physics, computer science, or related field, plus 2-3 years’ experience in data analysis and/or scientific research support. Master’s degree may be substituted for 1-2 years’ experience.', 'The Community Science and Data Center (CSDC) at NOIRLab has an opening for a\xa0Data Analyst.\xa0In this role, you will work with one or more teams of scientists, engineers, external collaborators, and other staff to support software systems and data resources that enable forefront research in astronomy.', 'Management of unstructured data sets', 'Relevant programming languages (Python, C/C++, Java)', 'NSF’s National Optical-Infrared Astronomy Research Laboratory (NOIRLab) is the preeminent US national center for ground-based, nighttime optical and infrared astronomy. NOIRLab is a Federally Funded Research and Development Center (FFRDC) which operates as a matrix organization, providing services across a range of programs: Gemini, Rubin, MSO (CTIO and KPNO), and CSDC; with facilities in three geographic locations: Arizona, Chile and Hawai’i. The mission of NOIRLab is to enable breakthrough discoveries in astrophysics by developing and operating state-of-the-art ground-based observatories and providing data products and services for a diverse and inclusive community.', 'Required Qualifications:', '\xa0Desired qualifications:', '****NOIRLab\xa0has\xa0the majority\xa0of\xa0staff\xa0working remotely during COVID-19 crisis. job_title: Data Analyst - Revenue & Digital Ad Intelligence
job_text: ['', 'Work alongside the Product and Engineering Ad Code teams to design, build & provide scalable automated reportingCreate revenue dashboards and ad code monitoring that tie back to releasesAnalyze ongoing A/B tests and weekly ad code releases and provide insights and recommendations based on findingsAbility to work across multiple projects while remaining focused on granular details', 'CafeMedia is seeking a data-driven and ambitious Data Analyst to join our team!', 'Expert knowledge of SQL and relational databases', 'Expert knowledge of SQL and relational databases4+ years experience in data analysis or related fieldsBasic programming languages a strong plus (R, Python, HTML, Javascript)Familiarity with Looker/Tableau or similar Data Visualization softwareUnderstanding of digital advertising and more specifically programmatic advertisingCapable of working with business partners, engineering and other data teams with the ability to influence senior stakeholdersBachelor’s degree in CS, Statistics, Math or related', 'SQL via Snowflake, Athena, Redash', 'Analyze ongoing A/B tests and weekly ad code releases and provide insights and recommendations based on findings', '4+ years experience in data analysis or related fields', 'Ad manager Data Transfer logs', 'Work alongside the Product and Engineering Ad Code teams to design, build & provide scalable automated reporting', 'Key areas of expertise (not all required):', 'Expert knowledge of the digital ad spaceAd manager Data Transfer logsSSP and Prebid/Header Bidding data setsSQL via Snowflake, Athena, RedashAutomated reporting with AWS', 'Capable of working with business partners, engineering and other data teams with the ability to influence senior stakeholders', 'Qualifications', 'Ability to work across multiple projects while remaining focused on granular details', 'SSP and Prebid/Header Bidding data sets', 'The Data Analyst - Revenue & Digital Ad Intelligence, will focus on Specific areas to include:', 'Familiarity with Looker/Tableau or similar Data Visualization software', 'CafeMedia empowers more than 3,000 premium publishers on our AdThrive platform, with a collective reach of over 170MM monthly unique visitors (#11 largest ComScore property in December 2020), to make a living doing what they love - producing great content - while we manage the advertising, and an increasing number of services, for them. From food to home to news, sports and technology, and more, we represent the influential voices that make the internet a better and more open place. As the largest exclusive publisher network, with direct access to code-on-page and underlying datasets, we have a unique capability to build innovative products and services that span across publishers, advertisers, and consumers. With our scale and market position, we have the opportunity to create one of the defining companies of the next generation of digital media.', 'This position can be in-office in New York City or work-from-home remote. Remote U.S. candidates encouraged to apply. ', 'Basic programming languages a strong plus (R, Python, HTML, Javascript)', 'Automated reporting with AWS', 'Data Analyst', 'Understanding of digital advertising and more specifically programmatic advertising', 'Bachelor’s degree in CS, Statistics, Math or related', 'Create revenue dashboards and ad code monitoring that tie back to releases', 'CafeMedia is committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion. We believe we are most impactful when people with a wide range of backgrounds, experiences, and identities come together with common purpose. We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply.', 'Expert knowledge of the digital ad space']

multi-task, adhere to deadlines, and adapt to changing priorities in a remote working setting.', 'SUMMARY OF POSITION ', 'Apply today to speak with a Technical Recruiter on our team.', 'BHI Energy Staffing Solutions Group (SSG) is seeking an experienced Energy / Power Generation - Financial Data Analyst for a great location in Houston, TX with flexibility to be remote (with easy access to Houston office).  Ideal candidate will have electric U.S. power generation assets and market analysis. Will bring a demonstrated understanding of the fundamental drivers of power and natural gas markets and their impact on generation assets with a well-rounded understanding of the U.S. electricity sector including generation, transmission and distribution segments of the market. ', 'The Financial / Market Data Analyst (“Analyst”) will be responsible for supporting the analytical, financial and risk/insurance program management activities of the Company, particularly in area of electric U.S. power generation assets and market analysis. Ideal Analyst will bring a demonstrated understanding of the fundamental drivers of power and natural gas markets and their impact on generation assets with a well-rounded understanding of the U.S. electricity sector including generation, transmission and distribution segments of the market. The position demands flexibility and adaptability to be able to utilize core analytical and organizational skills to support diverse data processing and other support tasks in a remote work/small company-type environment. Scope of data analysis will include information about wholesale electricity market prices and could also include insurance cost, loss and exposure information such as developing tools to manage insurance premium charges and subsidiary allocations as well as organizing and analyzing loss and exposure data to support renewals and planning; and enterprise risk management and internal control program information such as risk mapping and internal control self-assessment processes. The Analyst is also responsible for providing support in managing energy market consultant, broker price and industry news subscriptions, budgeting, tracking, forecasting and ad hoc projects as applicable.']

['', 'Devise, generate, and maintain standard and exception reports as required for data validation, forecasting analysis, and meetings', 'Position Summary:', "What You'll Do: ", 'Utilize key Retailer Vendor Managed Systems for data analysis and reporting', 'Detail oriented, organized and strong on follow through', 'Develops global forecasts at the Customer/SKU level through a collaborative forecast processAssist in the development of new data-driven business processes and systems that will drive forecast accuracy, adding value to all downstream commercial and supply chain processesLiaise with E-Commerce, Planning, Sales, IT, Marketing and Customer Service departmentsUtilize key Retailer Vendor Managed Systems for data analysis and reportingDevise, generate, and maintain standard and exception reports as required for data validation, forecasting analysis, and meetingsDeliver training and provide Demand Planning systems support as required for the Sales, Marketing, and Supply Chain teamsMonitor SKU count and recommend SKU rationalization initiatives in the futureOther duties may be assigned', 'What you bring: ', 'Understanding of statistical principles (preferred)', 'Liaise with E-Commerce, Planning, Sales, IT, Marketing and Customer Service departments', 'Other duties may be assigned', 'Ability to work in a team-oriented and very fast paced environment with little supervision', 'Desire to advance and gain increased responsibility', 'Analyze and monitor all data points as related to sales and forecasts for Munchkin; including weekly POS, shipments, orders, current market trends, seasonal trends, new item performance and product version changes.', 'BS/BA in Economics, Statistics, Supply Chain/Operations or related field; and/or three to five years of consumer products forecasting/demand planning experience', 'Deliver training and provide Demand Planning systems support as required for the Sales, Marketing, and Supply Chain teams', 'Experience in Microsoft Office, Excel and the aptitude to learn various Retailer Vendor Managed Systems (Amazon Vendor Central, Content Analytics, IRI) and forecasting software (Galt)', 'Monitor SKU count and recommend SKU rationalization initiatives in the future', 'Proficient level of supply chain understanding and CPFR activities such as forecasting, inventory control, etc.', 'A problem solver who is comfortable taking initiative', 'Assist in the development of new data-driven business processes and systems that will drive forecast accuracy, adding value to all downstream commercial and supply chain processes', 'Experience with SQL (preferred)', 'An outgoing and enthusiastic personalityDetail oriented, organized and strong on follow throughAbility to work in a team-oriented and very fast paced environment with little supervisionDesire to advance and gain increased responsibilityA problem solver who is comfortable taking initiativeBS/BA in Economics, Statistics, Supply Chain/Operations or related field; and/or three to five years of consumer products forecasting/demand planning experienceExperience in Microsoft Office, Excel and the aptitude to learn various Retailer Vendor Managed Systems (Amazon Vendor Central, Content Analytics, IRI) and forecasting software (Galt)Proficient level of supply chain understanding and CPFR activities such as forecasting, inventory control, etc.Experience with SQL (preferred)Understanding of statistical principles (preferred)', 'An outgoing and enthusiastic personality', 'The Data Analyst has direct responsibility of developing forecasts on a Customer/SKU level through a collaborative forecast process with Sales, Marketing, Finance and Operations.\xa0This is done through analysis of key data points, usage of forecasting software, active participation in cross functional meetings, and utilizing information from retailer vender databases.', 'Develops global forecasts at the Customer/SKU level through a collaborative forecast process']

graduate education tuition reimbursement', 'Lead key analytical components of the project. Create analytical solutions from the complex healthcare datasets and derive meaningful insights and actionable plans for our clients', 'Additional benefits include a 401(k) plan, health, dental & disability insurance, 3 weeks paid vacation', 'Company Description: ', '\xa0', 'Exceptional professional growth and promotion opportunities', 'The ideal candidate is a highly intelligent and self-motivated individual with a strong work ethic and excellent team skills', 'Putnam Associates is a premier strategy consulting firm serving the global needs of pharmaceutical, biotechnology, diagnostics, medical device, and related clients in the healthcare space. For more than 30 years, we have provided objective, high impact strategic advice and analytical services, helping to support clients in crucial business decisions. Our firm’s exclusive focus on the life sciences industry allows us to deliver superior value to our clients by providing clarity and insight to complex issues. Consistently ranked as one of the Top Consulting Firms by Vault, Putnam offers a unique opportunity to play a central role in helping leading companies in this industry tackle their most pressing strategic challenges.', 'At Putnam, we pride ourselves on a team-based approach that is client focused and impact oriented.\xa0We serve many of the industry leaders, including all of the top 10 global biopharmaceutical companies. Almost all of our studies combine sophisticated quantitative analytics with significant qualitative fact-finding and synthesis to inform strategic decision-making. Our diverse casework spans portfolio prioritization, development pathway and resource optimization, market assessment, product pricing and launch strategies, market segment growth strategies, sales and marketing strategies, franchise development and patent expiration strategies.', 'Proven analytic abilities and a strong academic track record and problem-solving skills, (BA/BS degree with a major in a related field of quantitative science e.g., engineering, computer/data science, statistics, public health, epidemiology)', 'Competitive salary, accompanied by excellent year-end bonus', 'Compensation & Benefits:', 'Experience using cloud infrastructure, e.g., AWS, to perform analysis a plus', 'Communicate the analytical process from start to finish and present findings to internal teams and/or clients', 'Comprehensive training program and potential for graduate education tuition reimbursement', 'If you would like to join a dynamic organization and are ready for a challenging and rewarding career, please submit your application (cover letter and resume) to\xa0our Recruiting Manager, Emily Fiorito (emily.fiorito@putassoc.com)\xa0for consideration. Please note in your cover letter if you are interested in Boston, New York, or San Francisco.']

You invest extra time and energy to accomplish goals, and when a special project arises, you volunteer.', ' Assist with governance and deployment of Power BI, including administration, content distribution/sharing, training and support', ' Participate in discussions with business partners to define key business questions, translate them into necessary requirements documentation and develop visual data-driven solutions which answer those questions', ' Proactively monitor and evaluate the impact of monthly Power BI releases', ' Experience with Power BI development, visualizations and deployment (1-2 years)', " Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Design, Statistics, or equivalent", ' Demonstrated SQL development experience by writing queries and procedures and also using functions to create curated data for use in reporting', " Participate in discussions with business partners to define key business questions, translate them into necessary requirements documentation and develop visual data-driven solutions which answer those questions Develop reports, thoughtful visualizations, dashboards and KPI scorecards using Microsoft's Power BI and Azure stack employing leading visualization techniques Perform UX design activities and Power BI navigation features (e.g. bookmarks, drill-throughs) to guide end-users through a data-driven story Develop calculations in SQL, DAX and Power BI measures which are accurate and performant on large datasets Work with our internal customers to manage User Acceptance Testing (UAT) processes and address their feedback Assist with governance and deployment of Power BI, including administration, content distribution/sharing, training and support Champion the leading Power BI design methodology and best practices Extract data from various data sources; perform exploratory data analysis, cleanse, reshape, and aggregate data Evangelize data analytics best practices among peers and stakeholders Proactively monitor and evaluate the impact of monthly Power BI releases Conduct deep-dive data analysis for business insights and recommendations, including ad hoc analytics for executive-level requests and priorities", ' Work with our internal customers to manage User Acceptance Testing (UAT) processes and address their feedback', ' Champion the leading Power BI design methodology and best practices']

['', 'He/she will assist in developing CRM reporting and analytics to identify market, consumer, and product development opportunities. They will be comfortable using and analyzing various business intelligence sources (syndicated data, market level data, CRM/client data, custom consumer research, social/digital analytics, retailer customer data, and consumer trends) to help influence decisions and action planning for regional strategies that drive sales and client growth, while driving retention amongst key consumer targets.', '• Experienced in successfully managing agencies and consultant resources with demonstrated understanding of and proven implementation of analytics best practices', '• Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing or Computer Science', '• Entrepreneurial Resourcefulness (able to successfully operate with limited budgets and people resources)', '• Collate information for client playbook on all planned CRM programs and activities using direct mail, email, mobile, in-store clienteling, events, partnerships, etc.', '• Develop insights by drawing information from diverse sources (competitive landscape, consumer journey, category, cultural, past performance, etc.) to connect the dots for fact-based recommendations that drive the business.', 'PRINCIPAL MISSION', 'Our house has forged itself a legend. When Jules Louis Audemars and Edward Auguste Piguet joined forces in 1875, they did so with the conviction that their vision was unique and that their work would endure.\xa0Today, the family business is still in the hands of the descendants of the founding families, and the initial inspiration remains firmly embedded in its genes.\xa0Loyal to the spirit of the Vallée de Joux and in keeping with its inherited values of innovation and fine craftsmanship, the Manufacture in Le Brassus produces exclusive watches imbued with the spirit of the place where they were born.\xa0\xa0', '• Synthesize various data sources to help to drive business initiatives such as category reviews, new product launch, and go to market processes', 'Develop CRM/client data standardized reporting and analysis with recommendations and present to team on a monthly basis', 'The CRM Data Analyst will support the Regional Head of CRM to practice consumer-centric thinking to action across the brand and establish rigor in insights & data analytics.', 'Requirements', '• 3+ years of experience in CRM and Consumer Analytics', '• Partner with Regions, Affiliates, Online to align on strategies and to drive a multi-channel approach, including email strategy, direct mail, segmentation testing and VIP Program', 'Audemars Piguet is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. Audemars Piguet hires without regard to age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic characteristics, race, color, creed, religion, ethnicity, national origin, alienage, citizenship, disability, marital status, military status, pregnancy, or any other legally-recognized protected basis prohibited by applicable law', '• Comfortable presenting to all levels of management and working within a matrix organization', '• Advanced skills in PowerPoint, Excel (Pivot Tables, V-Lookup, etc.)', '• 3+ years of experience with CRM tools (Salesforce, SAP, etc;)', '• Complex problem-solving (create options, then converge)', 'Crafted by Watchmakers eager to give of their very best, they reflect a constant obsession with quality and with perfect finishing, as well as a vocation for the complex mechanisms characteristic of the valley.\xa0Each Audemars Piguet watch collection has its own distinct personality, eloquently testifying to time-honored know-how as well as to the impressive capacity of innovation cultivated by our venerable House.', '• Analytical and strategic planning (makes quick, fact-based decisions)', '• Assist market with analysis/consolidation of CRM campaigns using control techniques and corporate reporting tools to measure success / ROI. Succinctly and clearly summarize and communicate results and learnings to optimize future campaigns', '• Proven success driving CRM/eCRM and retail marketing strategies and implementing effective direct communication across channels.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', '• Passion for data-driven marketing and business intelligence across all channels; proven success in utilizing analytics to provide strategic recommendations and drive concrete action', '• Innovative and creative thinking (always challenging status quo)', '• Partner with marketing team to track customer behavior and lifecycle with the brand; use learnings to develop communication strategies to maximize engagement and loyalty', '• Perform in-depth consumer analytics to inform brand strategy and develop action steps that support key business objectives', 'Audemars Piguet offers a competitive and comprehensive benefits and PTO package.', '• Influencing skills (proven ability to persuade others towards an idea or goal)', '• Passion for reading numbers, visual representation of data and storytelling for actionable outcomes', '• Passion for understanding what makes people tick in luxury products / retail', '• Should be well-grounded in direct marketing metrics, segmentation, data analysis and response measurement', '• Create competitive case study reports, sharing CRM best practices and learnings from outside the industry to inspire innovation', '• Analysis to support key affiliates in executing CRM strategies geared towards lowering 1X Customer Rate, increasing Retention & Spend and optimizing ROI on campaigns', '• Strong relationship management and interpersonal skills (high EQ)']

['', "1stDibs is the world’s largest online luxury marketplace for rare and desirable objects. It has become the go-to source for the world's leading interior designers and consumers to find antiques, furniture, jewelry, vintage fashion and fine art.", 'Excellent verbal, written and visual presentation skills', '1stDibs is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.', 'Passionate about data analytics, data visualization and understanding consumer behavior', 'What you’ll bring', 'For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the hiring team following submission of your application.', 'Graduating with a B.S./B.A. in a quantitative field e.g. Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, etc', '1stDibs is actively hiring and, in response to COVID-19, conducting all interviews and onboarding virtually. Any new or current team members will be temporarily working remotely until our offices reopen, at which point all employees are expected and required to return physically to the New York office.', 'Fixed Term\xa0Junior Data Analyst\xa0', 'Generate insights from your analysis and present these back to relevant stakeholders', 'Prior experience working with retail transaction data a plus', 'Excellent problem-solving skills', 'Proficiency using Google Suite products (Docs, Sheets, Slides) or equivalent MS Office products (Word, Excel, Powerpoint)', 'Collaborate closely with all areas of the business (Product, Marketing, Operations, Supply) to provide scalable reports, dashboards and visualizations that inform key stakeholders and drive business processes', 'You’re naturally curious about consumer behavior and bring a passion not only for finding interesting nuggets of insight amongst a sea of data but also in the way you present your finding back to the business.\xa0\xa0As a business that has a core value of saying it with data, the role will give you the opportunity to learn and develop expertise around how a luxury e-commerce marketplace leverages analytics to drive decisions.\xa0Moreover, you will get hands-on experience in retail analytics and a chance to apply what you’ve learned at school to real-world transactional and web-tracking data. Your work will inform the strategy for one or more of our business units and have an impact on the growth of the company.', '\xa0', 'Backed by Benchmark Capital, Insight Venture Partners, Index Ventures, Spark Capital and Alibaba, 1stdibs is a unique blend of expert curators and seasoned Internet executives from companies including eBay, Gilt, Google, FreshDirect, Mlb.com, Shutterfly, and Twitter.', 'Who you are', 'Work together with other analytics team members to discuss your findings and identify areas to dig deeper on', 'Can confidently write queries in SQL - Required', 'Collaborate closely with all areas of the business (Product, Marketing, Operations, Supply) to provide scalable reports, dashboards and visualizations that inform key stakeholders and drive business processesCombine data from multiple data sources to be able to analyze customer behavior across our platformWork together with other analytics team members to discuss your findings and identify areas to dig deeper onGenerate insights from your analysis and present these back to relevant stakeholders', 'Knowledge of statistical analysis coding languages would be advantageous e.g. SAS (preferred), Python or R', 'We have a startup culture that is constantly evolving so comfort with ambiguity is very important. In exchange, you’ll be given the opportunity to work with and learn from some of the most passionate, driven and creative people assembled under one roof!', '1stDibs is the leading destination for vintage, antique and contemporary furniture, jewelry, art, and fashion.\xa0As a two-sided e-commerce platform, we bring together buyers of unique, beautiful things with the preeminent sellers in these categories. We are looking for a current undergraduate senior to join our analytics team as\xa0Fixed Term\xa0Junior Data Analyst\xa0and help stakeholders across the business unlock powerful insights and drive growth through impactful and innovative use of data.', 'Knowledge of BI tools such as Looker, Tableau, etc a plus', 'Graduating with a B.S./B.A. in a quantitative field e.g. Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, etcPassionate about data analytics, data visualization and understanding consumer behaviorExcellent verbal, written and visual presentation skillsExcellent problem-solving skillsCan confidently write queries in SQL - RequiredProficiency using Google Suite products (Docs, Sheets, Slides) or equivalent MS Office products (Word, Excel, Powerpoint)Knowledge of statistical analysis coding languages would be advantageous e.g. SAS (preferred), Python or RKnowledge of BI tools such as Looker, Tableau, etc a plusPrior experience working with retail transaction data a plus', 'Combine data from multiple data sources to be able to analyze customer behavior across our platform', 'What you’ll do']

['', 'Passionate and results oriented analyst with excellent analytical skills, enabling you to research, document and review existing systems and recommend improvements', 'Fully hands on with application builds and deploys using Continuous Integration/ Deployment (CI/CD) tools like Jenkins, Maven, uDeploy, etc.', 'We are responsible for calculating quarterly fee and related capabilities for Managed Accounts products. The squad will create the vision for the journeys and capabilities and the delivery squads will execute on the delivery.', 'Deep experience with Oracle or related databases and ability to write sophisticated queries', 'Solid grasp of technical landscape for web and batch applications', 'Practical experience with Test Driven Development or Behavior Driven Development a plus', 'Ability to prioritize and delegate the work based on strategic nature, importance, and urgency.', 'Thinking like a business partner, building intuitive and user-friendly interfaces that will simplify and improve the user experience', 'Experience in developing automation test scripts, using Java, Git stash, Maven, and Cucumber; performing functional, integration, and performance tests in Red Hat Linux servers, using Java and Oracle; and ensuring development features are available in for validations', 'You are:', 'Have ability to diagram business processes and system workflows', 'Come join Fidelity in 2021 as we have our Better Way of Working! The mission is to join others in Managed Solutions Fee and Billing squad under Client Solutions Technology chapter towards greater delivery, efficiency, and quality. Frontdoor is a company that’s obsessed with taking the hassle out of owning a home. Frontdoor serves more than two million customers across the U.S. through a network of more than 16,000 pre-qualified contractor firms that employ over 45,000 technicians. The company’s customizable home service plans help customers protect and maintain their homes from costly and unexpected breakdowns of essential home systems and appliances. ['', 'Exercise best practice agile communication through channels like JIRA, Confluence and Redmine.', ' Provide design support for the development of business intelligence solutions. Work on small to mid-sized and cross-functional IT and business intelligence solutions. Participate in the workstream planning process including inception, technical design, development, testing and delivery of BI solutions. Work with internal and external customers and IT partners to develop and analyze business intelligence needs. Interpret business requirements and determine optimum BI solutions to meet needs. Identify and provide input to new technology opportunities that will have an impact on the Enterprise wide BI systems. Create interactive Power BI dashboards and visualizations, displaying dialysis costs and facility trends for our clients, using statistical techniques. Extract and structure data using advanced MS Excel and SQL tools to meet reporting requirements from the business and clients. Analyze internal predictive analysis models to forecast the progression of chronic kidney disease patients into end stage kidney disease. Provide innovative solutions in the BI development space and provide a pattern for business teams to consume and build BI artifacts using enterprise-guiding principles. Exercise best practice agile communication through channels like JIRA, Confluence and Redmine.', 'Create interactive Power BI dashboards and visualizations, displaying dialysis costs and facility trends for our clients, using statistical techniques.', 'Participate in the workstream planning process including inception, technical design, development, testing and delivery of BI solutions.', 'Work with internal and external customers and IT partners to develop and analyze business intelligence needs.', 'Analyze internal predictive analysis models to forecast the progression of chronic kidney disease patients into end stage kidney disease.', 'Provide innovative solutions in the BI development space and provide a pattern for business teams to consume and build BI artifacts using enterprise-guiding principles.', 'Interpret business requirements and determine optimum BI solutions to meet needs.', 'Extract and structure data using advanced MS Excel and SQL tools to meet reporting requirements from the business and clients.', 'Work on small to mid-sized and cross-functional IT and business intelligence solutions.', 'Identify and provide input to new technology opportunities that will have an impact on the Enterprise wide BI systems.', 'As a BI Analyst You Will', 'Provide design support for the development of business intelligence solutions.']

', ' The Position ', '3+ years of experience in data analysis and management ', ' Revolutionizing the treatment system. Some knowledge of website development is helpful but not required ', ' The Crisis ', ' Revolutionizing the treatment system. We are transforming the healthcare delivery system so that every person facing addiction has access to quality care and treatment based on science. Breaking down addiction-related stigmas. Addiction is a treatable disease, not a weakness. By changing people’s attitudes and behaviors, we’re reducing the shame in order to encourage patients to seeking life- saving treatment, and providing reassurance, compassion, and support for a full and fulfilling life. Supporting and empowering our communities. We are providing science-based educational resources that aid in the prevention, treatment and recovery of addiction, while building hope, confidence and resiliency within families and communities, and advocating for life-saving policies.Shatterproof’s growth and achievements are a testament to our investors and the growing number of stakeholders and communities rising up against addiction. Together, we can reverse this health crisis and create a better and brighter future, free from the disease of addiction and the stigma that surrounds it.For more information, please visit Accomplishments . ['', 'We Are Looking For Talented Folks Who', 'Training:', ' Want to know why things work the way they do. Excel at explaining things with the right amount of detail. Are capable communicators with the spoken and written word. Know how to collaborate within a team environment. Are dedicated learners with the ability to use software. ', 'Technical Specifications: ', 'Problem Solving:', 'Prioritization: Our software is ever-changing. With that comes the need to prioritize what, when, and how changes are made. Since you’re working with the software and our clients daily, who better to prioritize than you? Business analysts are constantly asking themselves: Does this feature need to be completed before a certain time? What is the impact of this bug? How can other clients benefit from this change? We use a ticketing system to track pieces of work such as functionality requests and bug fixes. We then prioritize them for developers to work on.', 'Problem Solving: Every day you work to solve complex problems. When you analyze a calculation, investigate the cause of a bug, or propose a new process you are venturing into unfamiliar territory to find a solution. Our clients and developers rely on your problem solving skills to ensure our software is built and supported effectively.', 'Implementations: We’re a growing company and adding new clients is an exciting part of that growth! Since you’re a subject matter expert, you coordinate with new clients to configure the software to best fit their needs. Think of yourself as a consultant. What business processes does the client need to accomplish? How can our software fit in with and help that process?', 'Want to know why things work the way they do.', 'Technical Specifications: It’s your job to convey to the developers what changes need to be made. What happens when you click this button? What does the page look like? How is this file transferred to an external system? In this way, you are directly affecting the product and our clients’ experience.', 'Training: Helping clients learn about how our software works is also part of your role. Whether it’s a new client coming up to speed on how tasks are completed, or an existing client that is incorporating a new feature into their process, you’re a resource for providing the information and tools they need.', 'Prioritization:', 'Testing: When a developer completes a change, you get to test it out (in a beta environment) to ensure that it’s working correctly.
